story:
Women Organizing Against Harassment (WOAH)

Women Organizing Against Harassment (WOAH) is an organization dedicated to eradicating gender violence and sexual assault on campus by means of education about rape culture, enthusiastic consent, and self-empowerment

  • WOAH is working to get its core members down to Washington D.C. for the Feminist Majority Foundation's Young Feminist Leadership Conference. From March 29th to the 31st, the nation's young feminists will be attending workshops, panels, and plenary sessions ranging in topic from global women’s rights to campus organizing tips all featuring campus activists, feminist and political leaders, and other public figures. WOAH will spend its last day lobbying by working to inspire our representatives to remediate the issue of the backlogging of rape-kits:  http://www.feminist.org/nomoreexcuses/

       Check it out!: 

http://feminist.org/blog/index.php/2013/12/18/register-at-early-bird-rates-for-the-national-young-feminist-leadership-conference/

  • Women only comprise 18.5% of Congress. Women and women's issues matter, and they are not being represented adequately. By supporting WOAH's trip to D.C, you are helping plant the seeds of future female politicians and world leaders.
WOAH is ready to inspire and deliver change, and we need your help.


Contributions for a better world.

WOAH is looking to raise a grand total of $1,200.

  • The funds will cover the entirety of the expenses for 12 core members:

      • Registration Cost: $20 per person = $240.00

      • Hotel Room: $129/night (2 evenings) x 3 (rooms needed)  = $774.00

      • Gas: $20/car (3 total); there & back= $120.00

      • Miscellaneous: ~ $66.00 

        • Total= $1,200

  •  If WOAH does not reach its goal, it will still be using everything that has been donated to fund its trip down to D.C. Additional fundraising will take place in the time between the end of the campaign and the conference - WE WILL GET THERE!

WOAH prides itself on the participation of all its members, from the periphery down to the core, and their super duper über creativity: CHECK OUT THE PERKS!

ALL OF THE EXTRA MONEY RAISED WILL TO GO WOAH's GENERAL FUNDS

Anything and everything helps.

We definitely understand that some people just can’t contribute (we are college students living on free pizza and ramen), but there are free ways to help us out!

  • Share our campaign via classroom conversation, lunch dates and, of course, social media!

story:
LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF...

Hi my name is Rita.  My clients call me Reiki Rita.  I am an Intuitive Energy Healer, Teacher and Certified Life Coach.  I am highly regarded for the work I do in the Holistic-Health industry offering over 10+ years of experience.  Although Reiki heals on all levels of our physical, mental, emotional and spiritual health, I am highly specialized in the area of emotional healing.  Mainly because our emotions determine the root of our physical health! 

I am an advocate for protecting the rights of the "vulnerable" (especially of children) and will continue to inspire healthy, positive change in people, our environment and humanity in general!  Don't you think it's time we took our power back!  My philosophy is when we keep encouraging the way people think and behave in a loving and positive way - we can change the world for the better - one person at a time!

MY PASSION

I feel priviledged to have an opportunity to reach out to you personally and ask for your support in backing my book project.  This is my first book and another to follow that I am very excited to share with you at a later date as well.  The idea for the book started over 6 years ago with me journaling my feelings in order to heal and "reparent" myself from my dysfunctional family.  My journaling resulted in two book. Parents with Price Tags is the first and will launch this March and the other on conquering fear and raising your a healthy self esteem will release late 2014 (if I can raise the necessary funding -- with your help!). 

"Parents With Price Tags" will inspire global change.  It goes where no other book has with respect to uncovering many of the common concerns many families experience and why they exist.  In this book you will learn to -

  • recognize many common family problems and why they exist;
  • identify issues in your family, understand why and how they affect you, and learn healthier alternatives to family life;
  • replace feelings of fear and hopelessness with feelings of love and hope;
  • stop being controlled and take control of your own life;
  • find self-love and self-respect;
  • embrace your true self; and
  • find the courage to live the life you deserve by taking the necessary steps that will change your life and lead you to inner peace and genuine happiness - GUILT FREE!

PROGRESS OF THE BOOK? 

Both books are written. "Parents with Price Tags" is in the final editing of the manuscript, ready to move to design, publishing and then printing.  Second book still needs professional editing, design and publishing.

......Here's why I need your support in order to make these books available to you and others...As a single mom with 3 children and a business to run, I honestly had no idea that I would be guided to write a book, let alone two of them or how much money it involves.  So that is why I am reaching out to you for your generous support in order to to make this happen!  I truly believe you or someone you love will see real value in the content of these books...

MY VISION FOR OUR FUTURE?  To raise our children on purpose and with purpose!  I would also like to create a Parenting Life Skill Program that will prepare people for the realties of modern parenthood in the 21st Century.  If your generous support surpasses $10,000, I can make this a reality!

THOUGHT??  If we can put forth a conscious effort to improve our economy, preserve our wildlife, and protect our rain forests, don't you think it's time we saved our precious children?

Other Ways You Can Help?

I realize that some of you may not be in a financial position to help me right now.  You are what I call wealthy in spirit but poor in cash.  But, there is still ways you can help out:

  • HELP SPREAD THE WORD - twitter, facebook, pinterest, linked in, or instigram the message to everyone you know. 
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools available to you to make a little noise and help heal the world!

My deepest gratitude for your help and your kind generosity!

namaste, Reiki Rita

Short Summary

The Vision of a Founder: A Journey in a Start-Up World brings the reader and audience along Ben’s roller coaster ride of first hand proven life experiences that navigates his journey towards prosperity through tough adversity.

The book proves to be inspirational, motivational, and educational for anyone or family involved in a start-up or small business where challenges arise calling for action to solve problems daily.

Ben Washburn, author of The Vision of a Founder has experienced and more importantly, lived in the world of start-ups and this experience is invaluable to you in handling your learning curve as you navigate a new venture or life transition.

An Iowa farm boy with a strong Midwest work ethic combined with urban experience and savvy professionalism, Ben has compiled a career history with many transferrable skills that will propel you on your journey of discovery towards prosperity. 

This campaign is about getting Ben's book published and distributed to his audience.  The Vision of a Founder: A Journey in a Start-Up World.  This is important to Ben to motivate those in a start-up world but also to help the founder navigate their journey towards prosperity through adversity.  

As a contributor, you will be really helping Ben get his book published.  Please visit Ben's video providing more about this book campaign and more about Ben's background and experience founding MMI Consulting Group.

What We Need & What You Get

Below is our teams original approach.  At this point with 9 hours left and with other  factors, we are moving full steam ahead with publishing and considering multiple options, distribution channels, marketing, motivational speaking engagements and helping others by promoting The Vision of a Founder.  I'm really not that stressed, however, if we can get to $2,000 - $4,000 range in 9 hours through marketing, social media, and family/friends support, we can offset our expenses incurred quicker making our vendors happier.  We certainly live in a startup world and I am very excited to share the published book and iBook version this summer!  Look for me on our book tour and your nearest speaking engagement.

Ben's book campaign is seeking $10,000 in funding for the project.  It is needed to get the book through copy writing, editing, layout, design, binding, and printing for distribution to the audience.  

The Vision of a Founder: A Journey in a Start-Up World.  There are many unique perks that have been offered to you.  Ben has spent years getting towards the final version of the book and to tell his story in his book.  These levels are unique ways to help spread the word, participate and contribute to this campaign, and get one of the first copies of the book in print.  There are also unique opportunities to meet with Ben in the cities where the book was born to hear first hand stories at the actual locations.  

The Impact

The Vision of a Founder is very valuable to you as a contributor to be one of the first to receive a hard cover printed and published book to help others.  Ben is honored and humbled in this experience of getting the vision of his first book completed.  It is a work in process daily as a founder struggles to make ends meet financially while launching a start-up.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to get more involved.  DONATE TODAY FOR THE PERKS AND ALL RECEIVE AN iBOOK VERSION INCLUDED!!!!!!!!  We thank you for your consideration and please contribute so Ben can print more books to help more people.  Remember to use the share tools as well to engage your social networks and help spread the word!

story:
Bienvenido al castillo

Soy un escultor y colaboro con algunas marcas del mercado de las miniaturas, actualmente trabajo en "Zenit miniatures" aunque en mis ratos libres intento dedicar tiempo a mi marca "MOMminiaturas" que es pequeño proyecto personal. 

El motivo de la campaña es que llevo tiempo trabajando en este escenario modular para dungeons, pero los moldes para poder sacarlos a la venta son bastante caros, si me ayudan a sacarlos adelante, aparte de las construcciones y el mobiliario, podría sacar miniaturas muy baratas como se puede ver en mi pagina. 

http://momminiaturas.jimdo.com/

https://www.facebook.com/DivineRage

Como he comentado anteriormente lo mas caro del proyecto es el material y el transporte de este, pero también tenemos que tener en cuenta que la vida de los moldes no es ilimitada.


Welcome to the Castle

I am a sculptor and I collaborate with some brands of miniatures market, currently working on "Zenit miniatures", but in my free time I try to spend time on my brand "MOMminiaturas" which is my small personal project.

The theme of the campaign is that I've been working on this scenario for modular dungeons, but the molds to make the sale are quite expensive, if you could help me to carry out, in addition to buildings and furniture could get very thumbnails cheap as you can see on my website.

http://momminiaturas.jimdo.com/

https://www.facebook.com/DivineRage

As I mentioned previously the most expensive project is the material and the transport of this, but we must also take intoaccount the life of the molds is not unlimited.

.

                                       

                      

                      

                      

                     

                     



                    

          


En el pack 1 ahorras 2€ en add on

In pack 1 you save 2€ in add on

                 

   


En el pack 2 ahorras 12€ en add on

In pack 2 you save 12€ in add on

                 


En el pack 3 ahorras 24€ en add on

In pack 3 you save 24€ in add on

                 

          

     

En el pack 4 ahorras 50€ en add on

In pack 4 you save 50€ in add on

                 



Habrá uno gratis para todos los backers, y se pueden añadir  por 1€

There will be one free for all backers, and you can add  on for 1 €

story:
Short Summary

  • We (Soner Oruc & Kasim Kirlangic) are biology and archaeology students in Middle East Technical University (METU) in Ankara/TURKEY. http://www.metu.edu.tr/ 
  • We are also active members of  METU Birdwatching Society for 9 years. We worked in different nature conservation projects as a volunteer or as a professional and  organised numerous bird watching trips in METU, in Ankara and also in whole Turkey to promote birdwatching in Turkey. We also contributed to the bird report of "Birds of METU 1995-2008" 
  • http://www.trakus.org/kods_bird/pdf/69374.pdf
  • We also constructed the web page of  "Nature's of METU" http://www.odtudogasi.org/ 
  • We now prepared "A Field Guide to Birds of METU" which is  A5 size, 300 pages high quality paper book including all the bird species (227 species) observed in METU Campus. Every bird has one page including its photo and a table showing information about its size, habitat, food, distribution, rarity and a timetable showing its sight months.The book also contains information about bird watching. How to do, Where to do, Why to do?... And a chapter about Nature of METU.
  • We hope this book will be a good guide for nature lovers and will help them to discover the beauty of METU. This will be a small but a powerful step to advocate for conservation of this pristine land.  
  • With your contribution, you will not only help us to publish this book and to encourage us and make us hopeful but also you will  have some copies (according to your contribution) of this book posted to your address. Most importantly You will be contributing for the conservation of this last unique natural habitat in the middle of Ankara, the capital city of Turkey.


What We Need & What You Get

  • To publish "The Field Guide to Birds of METU" We need 3500 $.  All the budget (how much we get) we will get from this campaign will be spend for publishing 1000 (thousand) copy of this book. 

The Impact

    • With your contribution, you will not only help us to publish this book and to encourage us and make us hopeful but also you will also have some copies (according to your contribution) of this book posted to your address after max 2 weeks of the publishment. 
    • In every of your 15$ (which will be the sale price of this book)  contribution, You will have one copy of the book posted in your address. (15$=1 book, 30$=2 books, 45$=3 books....) 
    •  More importantly by contributing for publishing of this book You will be contributing for the conservation of this last unique natural habitat in the middle of Ankara, the capital city of Turkey.

Risks & Challenges

On the way to this campaign we may not be able to get entire budget (3500$). In that situation We are planning to borrow the rest of the money from our families and friends. The next option is to publish the number of book that we can afford (this will be less than 1000 copy)

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can not afford to contribute to our campaign as a money, You can even help us to search for cheap printing press. Or you can share this campaign with your friends or in different email groups, web pages...And lastly, do not hesitate to ask for a copy of the book if you are really can not afford to buy this book after publication. Good birding! :)


    Soner Oruç
    İşbankası
    POZCU/MERSİN Şubesi
    Hesap No: 6606 0664289


    IBAN: TR40 0006 4000 0016 6060 6642 89

story:
12 Guardians Christian Thriller Book Series

The 12 Guardians is a book series I started writing early in 2013. I have just finished publishing book 5, and I'm about 50,000 words into book 11.

12 Guardians

Hand chosen to guard Jesus, putting everything on the line, so Jesus is protected. No sacrifice is too big or small. They must survive the weekend so they can rescue John the Baptist.

The Sixx

Evil incarnate, dedicated to making sure Jesus doesn’t make it to the crucifixion and none of the Guardians make it either.

Descriptions of each book -

12 Guardians (the first 3) includes Books 1-3

The Sixx are evil incarnate. Their mission is to alter history by ensuring Jesus is never crucified – changing the world as we know it. In their way stand The Guardians, intent on stopping them by any means necessary.

When things go bad in Hazard, Kentucky, veteran Guardians Salome and Saul recruit David Sigmond, an ER nurse, and Isaac Smyth, a children’s preacher, to their cause. The new Guardians are drawn into a dangerous adventure when The Sixx attack right before their very eyes. With new skills and powers thrust upon them, they find themselves journeying further from home than they could ever have imagined – over 2000 years back in time.

Scattered through the ages, the haphazard group do what they can to thwart The Sixx; Isaac and Salome are sent to protect John the Baptist, teaming up with Guardian Shagmar along the way. David is sent on his Reckoning, where he finds an ally Guardian Miriam. Saul is stuck in present times, dealing with the loss of his Guardian powers, but still doing what he can to combat their deadly foe. But will all of the Guardians survive their personal battles and The Sixx?

Book 4 - The Nest - also includes the short story Austin

The Sixx are building an impenetrable fortress, deep underground: the Nest.

But the Guardians have other problems. Salome is forced to confront her loss as she packs up the home she shared with her late husband, Abe. David discovers his wife has a shocking secret and Isaac finds it hard to tear himself away from his best friend’s widow, after speaking at his funeral. Ex-Guardian Saul is forced to team up with an unlikely ally: a man who tried to kill him, under the instruction of the Sixx themselves.

Together, they plot to infiltrate the Nest, to retrieve four Guardian bracelets, stolen by the Sixx over thirty years ago. But along the way, they discover another plot, more hideous than any of them could ever have imagined.

Book 5 - Abraham - In the Beginning

Ex-guardian Saul learns about his new driving friend Zig while the pair transport the Guardians to a safe place for their jump.

David and Miriam manage to co-ordinate their jump to meet up in the times of Jesus and spend their trip tending Miriam’s flock. But when her replacement is murdered and they have unexpected visitors in the night, they may not be in for the relaxing jump they anticipated.

New Guardians Ben and Aly are sent on their Reckoning, their mission to protect a young boy and his family from the Sixx’s interference. But the young boy has an important future and the Sixx resources are thick on the ground, which proves to be quite a daunting task for the newest duo.

Book 6 - Traitor

The book we're working on finishing now. There is a traitor in the Guardians, who is it and what damage has been done...

So why are we running an Indiegogo campaign? It takes money to get the books from my computer to the hands of my readers, and I hope you can help me do just that.

The Formats

We offer our books and you can buy them in several different formats.

Digital download - available - every format, every type of reader file.  We will email this file to you.

Paper Back - Digital plus - we'll mail you a USB drives which contain the book files.

One for you one to giveaway - Two copies of the paperback and two usb drives.

The Saint - paperback, one USB drive and your name in the credits of whatever books you buy (books 6-12)

All paperback books are signed.


Get a FREE sample of the first chapter of four of our books. Click here - fill out the form and we'll email you a pdf version.


Delivery and Perks

Two types of perks, one sends you the goods at a small profit to us, the other (the Saint) gives us more money to put into the edit fund.

Book 6 -


Ebook $5.00
Paperback + USB $20.00

story_txt:
12 Guardians Christian Thriller Book SeriesThe 12 
Guardians is a book series I started writing early in 2013. I have just 
finished publishing book 5, and I'm about 50,000 words into book 11.12 GuardiansHand chosen to guard Jesus, 
putting everything on the line, so Jesus is protected. No sacrifice is 
too big or small. They must survive the weekend so they can rescue John 
the Baptist.The SixxEvil incarnate, dedicated to making sure Jesus doesn’t make it to the crucifixion and none of the Guardians make it either.Descriptions of each book -12 Guardians (the first 3) includes Books 1-3The Sixx are evil incarnate. Their mission is to alter history by 
ensuring Jesus is never crucified – changing the world as we know it. In
 their way stand The Guardians, intent on stopping them by any means 
necessary.
When things go bad in Hazard, Kentucky, veteran Guardians Salome and
 Saul recruit David Sigmond, an ER nurse, and Isaac Smyth, a children’s 
preacher, to their cause. The new Guardians are drawn into a dangerous 
adventure when The Sixx attack right before their very eyes. With new 
skills and powers thrust upon them, they find themselves journeying 
further from home than they could ever have imagined – over 2000 years 
back in time.
Scattered through the ages, the haphazard group do what they can to 
thwart The Sixx; Isaac and Salome are sent to protect John the Baptist, 
teaming up with Guardian Shagmar along the way. David is sent on his 
Reckoning, where he finds an ally Guardian Miriam. Saul is stuck in 
present times, dealing with the loss of his Guardian powers, but still 
doing what he can to combat their deadly foe. But will all of the 
Guardians survive their personal battles and The Sixx?
Book 4 - The Nest - also includes the short story AustinThe Sixx are building an impenetrable fortress, deep underground: the Nest.
But the Guardians have other problems. Salome is forced to confront 
her loss as she packs up the home she shared with her late husband, Abe.
 David discovers his wife has a shocking secret and Isaac finds it hard 
to tear himself away from his best friend’s widow, after speaking at his
 funeral. Ex-Guardian Saul is forced to team up with an unlikely ally: a
 man who tried to kill him, under the instruction of the Sixx 
themselves.
Together, they plot to infiltrate the Nest, to retrieve four 
Guardian bracelets, stolen by the Sixx over thirty years ago. But along 
the way, they discover another plot, more hideous than any of them could
 ever have imagined.
Book 5 - Abraham - In the BeginningEx-guardian Saul learns about his new driving friend Zig while the pair 
transport the Guardians to a safe place for their jump.  
David and Miriam manage to co-ordinate their jump to meet up in the 
times of Jesus and spend their trip tending Miriam’s flock. But when her
 replacement is murdered and they have unexpected visitors in the night,
 they may not be in for the relaxing jump 
they anticipated.
New Guardians Ben and Aly are sent on their Reckoning, their mission
 to protect a young boy and his family from the Sixx’s interference. But
 the young boy has an important future and the Sixx resources are thick 
on the ground, which proves to be 
quite a daunting task for the newest duo.
Book 6 - TraitorThe book we're working on finishing now. There is a traitor in the Guardians, who is it and what damage has been done...So
 why are we running an Indiegogo campaign? It takes money to get the 
books from my computer to the hands of my readers, and I hope you can 
help me do just that.The FormatsWe offer our books and you can buy them in several different formats.Digital download - available - every format, every type of reader file.  We will email this file to you.Paper Back - Digital plus - we'll mail you a USB drives which contain the book files.One for you one to giveaway - Two copies of the paperback and two usb drives.The Saint - paperback, one USB drive and your name in the credits of whatever books you buy (books 6-12)All paperback books are signed.
Get a FREE sample of the first chapter of four of our books. Click here - fill out the form and we'll email you a pdf version.
Delivery and Perks
Two types of perks, one sends you the goods at a small profit to us, the other (the Saint) gives us more money to put into the edit fund.Book 6 -Ebook $5.00Paperback + USB $20.00One for me - one to giveaway $40.00Paperback + USB Saint $50.00Delivery before December 15th.The Series So Far plus Book 6Includes - the first three books, Book 4, 5, and 6.  Delivered together when Book 6 is published.Ebook $25Paperback + USB - $60.00One for me - one to giveaway $130.00Paperback + USB Saint $150.00Delivery before December 15th.The Entire SeriesIncludes - the first three, Book 4, 5, and 6.  Delivered together when Book 6 is published. story:
Short Summary

 

I am Jennifer George,Co-Founder of Afrocaribe International Magazine, and Kennedy Iden,Publisher , aim to bridge the gap between communities and nations. We have found  that communities  in Canada and the World, know little about each others culture, history.Afrocaribe magazine highlights all aspects of our communities' culture, including  our Youths. Our readers enjoy reading and learning about different cultures, which enables us to realise our similarities, promoting  understanding, tolerance and harmony, thus adding value to our communities.

For the past four issues of Afrocaribe magazine, funding has been a major challenge, we have used our own private funds to produce the past  4 issues, amounting to thousands of dollars. Your contributions will enable us to produce the fifth issue of the magazine, giving us consistency,  building our credibility with advertisers and so bringing us closer to being more visible to advertisers and the public.

    What We Need & What You Get

     

    We need 25,000 dollars to publish the 5th issue. This money goes to editing of the articles, the graphic designer, printing of thousands of copies, distribution and advertising after printing.

    We have many perks, we will do features of all contributors in the 5th issue of the magazine.

    Contributors will be highlighted,foundations, or you can advertise your business in the magazine, depending on the size of your contribution. 

    All contributors will receive one year subscription to Afrocaribe magazine.

    Advertising space,which will be seen by thousands of customers.

    We also have great seats to football games, with the Toronto Argonauts.

      Football lovers can get tickets to out favourite team,Toronto Argonauths.

    The Impact

     

    We have Successfully completed four issues of Afrocaribe International magazine.

    We look forward to your contributions, as this is also a means to showcase all our contributors, active  in the Community and  young and upcoming persons in Arts and Culture, Education,Style and Fashion, Health and Beauty,Sports,Family Focus,Entertainment,Cuisine and much more.

    Afrocaribe magazine can be found in many Caribbean countries, New York City,Nigeria,London and will also be found at  co-operate offices, libraries,salon and spas, retail outlets and Gateway Newsstands in Toronto.

      Risks & Challenges

       

      Our major challenge is finding support from advertisers.This will be overcome by being able to publish Afrocaribe on a regular basis,building confidence in the magazine to advertisers and the public as a whole.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Please encourage you friends to support us if you cannot.
        Thank you.

story:
20 años transformando vidas...

El Museo del Niño de Puerto Rico en el Viejo San Juan ha transformado la vida de miles de jóvenes, proveyéndoles una experiencia de crecimiento personal inigualable. A través del Programa de Facilitadores Voluntarios muchos recibieron su primera experiencia laboral y otros, el estímulo para desarrollarse en sus campos profesionales actuales.  Inolvidables memorias, amigos para toda la vida y un Museo al cual regresar con hijos y sobrinos es solo parte del legado que juntos hemos formado.

Como parte del 20 aniversario del Museo, llevaremos a cabo una actividad de Reencuentro de Facilitadores Voluntarios el jueves, 12 de diciembre en el Patio Interior del Museo de San Juan desde las 6:00 p.m. Habrá música en vivo, refrigerios y entremeses.

A través de esta plataforma podrás adquirir tus boletos para la actividad mientras aportas cada centavo al Programa de Facilitadores.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

El Programa de Facilitadores Voluntarios necesita $5,000 dólares para impulsar su fondo de estipendios.  Este fondo incentiva a aquellos facilitadores que cumplen con asistencia perfecta durante su tiempo voluntario y se destacan brindando un servicio de excelencia. De igual forma les ayuda a cubrir gastos de dieta y transportación que pueden incurrir durante sus días de labor en el Museo.

Puedes realizar cualquier aportación, desde $5 o $10 para recibir un boleto de entrada al Reencuentro de Facilitadores que se llevará a cabo el jueves, 12 de diciembre en el Patio Interior del Museo de San Juan desde las 6:00 p.m.

También podrás contribuir a través de otras categorías mayores en las que recibirás entradas al Museo, membresías para niños, camisetas, DVDs y libros Cuéntamelo Otra Vez, entre otros. ¡Cada aportación, tiene su recompensa!

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

  • Conviértete en un "spokesperson" del Museo y del Programa de Facilitadores Voluntarios. ¡Déjales saber la huella que el Museo ha dejado en tu vida!
  • Si contribuyes y no puedes asistir al Reencuentro, asegúrate de llamarnos al 787-722-3791 y dejarnos saber. Así nos permites recaudar más fondos.
  • Corre la voz de nuestras próximas actividades relacionadas al 20 aniversario del Museo del Niño de Puerto Rico en el Viejo San Juan: 
  • (1) Entrada Gratis al Museo, cortesía de la Fundación Angel Ramos - 13 de octubre y 22 de diciembre de 2013
  • (2) Gran Concierto Sinfónico de Estrellas Juveniles, con la participación de Bernie Williams- 27 de octubre a las 4:00pm en el Centro de Bellas Artes de Santurce.  Boletos a la venta en www.tcpr.com,
  • (3) Gran Celebración Familiar del 20 aniversario del Museo del Niño de Puerto Rico en el Viejo San Juan - 10 de noviembre de 2013 en los terrenos de El Morro, con la participación de Atención Atención, El Payaso Remi, el Circo Nacional PR, entre otros.

story:
Short Summary

My name Sri Sri Sri Jaya Jaya Myra Parameshwari Devi.  I'm the Founder & Director of Gita for the Masses.  We are a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization created to share sacred consciousness teachings which help people overcome obstacles and be victorious in life.

I'm creating a very unique and revolutionary training course called Making Life a Living Victory, based on the message of the Bhagavad-Gita but interpreted from a Maha Shakti, Divine Mother empowerment viewpoint!  Gita has NEVER been looked at in this way before, but here, is shows a clear approach to character development and empowered living! Perhaps even more important for global change, it shows a path towards interreligious dialogue, interfaith harmony and consciousness-based empowerment in life.

When looked at as an inner path of psychological and emotional growth, Gita becomes applicable to a person of any religion or belief system as a way to grow and develop ones character, strength of will and clarity of life.  When looked at from a Shakti viewpoint, it becomes even more applicable to modern, material life as a way to deeply connect with Spirit, God or Self.

The Making Life a Living Victory course is a 75-hour course of study, with 25-30 hours of in class time and 45-50 hours of individual study.  This same book that we are creating for this course will also serve as the main manual for a second more in-depth, expanded 225-hour course of study we anticipate developing by 2016!

Why This Project is Important

1. We have just as many problems in the West as the developing countries do.  We have successful people and lots of money in society, but a culture of greed, egoism, apathy and fend for yourself.  THIS MUST CHANGE!  People need to be taught the roots of character development, and HOW to go about making decisions in life that help both the individual and society progress.  The world cannot change until people learn how to have character!

2. No one has ever shown the dynamic Shakti side of Gita.  Ever. Gita has typically been translated from a transcendentalist or renunicate viewpoint, which does not show the power of its message for individual development and social change from an all-of-life embracing perspective. 

Looking from an integrated perspective of both the transcendental and Shakti perspectives combined shows a timeless message applicable to everyone as a way to grow in life and deeply connect with God, consciousness or a person's highest Self.  It is directly applicable to the Western way of life as a householder, parent, spouse, career holder and person desiring to make change in the world.  It also has a huge message to show in interfaith harmony, inter-religious dialogue and the importance of Self-development for societal change.

3. The sacred philosophy teachings are not in the mainstream!  Yoga (asana) is, but when you get down to how you work with the mind and emotions directly, off the mat, not so much!  This course is designed to change that and is perfect for integration into existing teacher training courses.

My Career Background

  • I run a communications consulting company (Myra Godfrey Consulting Inc.), helping people and businesses craft conscious communication and brand strategies.
  • Strong background in non-profit management and development work (over 7 years of Director level experience).
  • Over 12 years of experience in crafting targeted communications strategies.
  • I am an internationally published writer and speaker on spirituality and consciousness! I have recent articles in both the highly acclaimed Yoga Magazine and Tathaastu: So Be It! Magazine.
  • I have spoken on women's empowerment and spirituality at the United Nations for their week of spirituality and for International Women's Day.

You can find more about my individual consciousness and healing work and find my writings on my personal website Hridaya Healing.

My Spiritual Background

I grew up always being closely connected with God.  When I reached my late 20's I met my first Guru/teacher and took mantra initiation.  This is also where I extensively studied the Gita, learned about meditation and consciousness.

This led to many direct realization experiences and to connecting directly to Source and God through my own heart.  My Guru guided me to go out, teach and to trust my inner guidance because it was clear.

After starting the practice of Sri Vidya (which my inner guidance led me to), the Divine Mother herself came and initiated me into her Panchadasi and Shodasi mantras.  Later, I received full inititation into Sri Vidya, with the caveat from that Guru (Amritananda Natha) that Mother alone was my guide and to keep deepening the realization in my own heart.    I was given the guidance to teach and share what I knew and what I would learn with the world!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $11,000 to get the development of this course started and to increase our ability to reach more people with its message! Your donations will help with:
  • A real-world ad campaign in NYC focusing on self-empowerment and character development, as originationg form the core Self.
  • Discussion time with religious leaders of diverse faiths for the commentary section of this book, discussing inter-religious diaogue and interfaith harmony!
  • Art design for the workbook, including cover and back design.
  • Some writing time!  Over half of the work is already completed, including the Sanskrit translation! We need to write the commentary and get everything ready for the printing process.
  • Copyright and Trademark registration for the course.
  • Overall project and operating support for Gita for the Masses to successfully launch this new course! 

We've developed a very robust rewards program for you....and since we are a non-profit, your contributions will also be tax-deductable! 

Take a look at all of the rewards.  If you have any questions, contact us directly!  I am happy to talk with you by phone or e-mail.  You can find all of the contact info directly on the Gita for the Masses website here: www.gitaforthemasses.org.

The Impact

Individually:

  • Learn how powerful the intellect is for shaping your whole life.
  • How to identify your life purpose and go about fulfilling it.
  • Inner contemplation and transformation tools.
  • Self-accountability for thoughts, feelings and actions in life.
  • Psychological, emotional and consciousness growth.
  • Self-empowerment and character development.
  • Learn about the Shakti, feminine energies as they impact the psyche.

On a large scale:

  • Inter-religious dialogue and interfaith harmony!
  • Peace-building through fighting the inner war, not the outer one.
  • Social Change by creating empowered, authentic individuals!
  • Promote the inherent Oneness between diverse cultures and people
  • Anti-bullying.
  • Anti-violence.
  • Women's empowerment through understanding their core Shakti energy.
  • A new integrated look at spirituality that embraces all of life.

This is truly a revolutionary project; no one is doing anything like this!  No one is teaching this.  No one has looked at it in quite this way before....and this has the power to change the lives of people in the West for the better.  It has the potential to re-conceptualize the way people relate to their spirituality and core empowered self.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can get involved!  Here are some creative ideas for you: 

  • Share on your social media pages!  Let people know about this powerful and one of a kind work! Indiegogo has great built-in share tools! Check them out!
  • Contact your local media: people always want to know more about positive, unique projects, especially when they involve empowerment, peace-building, and social change!
  • Tell your local religious or spiritual community!  Tell your community leaders dedicated to social change!  We look to build dynamic, fulfilling partnerships!
  • Talk to other inspired change-makers and spread the world!
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name Sri Sri Sri Jaya Jaya Myra Parameshwari Devi.  I'm the Founder & Director of Gita for the Masses.  We are a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization created to share sacred consciousness teachings which help people overcome obstacles and be victorious in life.
I'm creating a very unique and revolutionary training course called Making Life a Living Victory, based on the message of the Bhagavad-Gita but interpreted from a Maha Shakti, Divine Mother empowerment viewpoint!  Gita has NEVER been looked at in this way before, but here, is shows a clear approach to character development and empowered living! Perhaps even more important for global change, it shows a path towards interreligious dialogue, interfaith harmony and consciousness-based empowerment in life.
When looked at as an inner path of psychological and emotional growth, Gita becomes applicable to a person of any religion or belief system as a way to grow and develop ones character, strength of will and clarity of life.  When looked at from a Shakti viewpoint, it becomes even more applicable to modern, material life as a way to deeply connect with Spirit, God or Self.
The Making Life a Living Victory course is a 75-hour course of study, with 25-30 hours of in class time and 45-50 hours of individual study.  This same book that we are creating for this course will also serve as the main manual for a second more in-depth, expanded 225-hour course of study we anticipate developing by 2016!
Why This Project is Important
1. We have just as many problems in the West as the developing countries do.  We have successful people and lots of money in society, but a culture of greed, egoism, apathy and fend for yourself.  THIS MUST CHANGE!  People need to be taught the roots of character development, and HOW to go about making decisions in life that help both the individual and society progress.  The world cannot change until people learn how to have character!
2. No one has ever shown the dynamic Shakti side of Gita.  Ever. Gita has typically been translated from a transcendentalist or renunicate viewpoint, which does not show the power of its message for individual development and social change from an all-of-life embracing perspective. 
Looking from an integrated perspective of both the transcendental and Shakti perspectives combined shows a timeless message applicable to everyone as a way to grow in life and deeply connect with God, consciousness or a person's highest Self.  It is directly applicable to the Western way of life as a householder, parent, spouse, career holder and person desiring to make change in the world.  It also has a huge message to show in interfaith harmony, inter-religious dialogue and the importance of Self-development for societal change. 


3. The sacred philosophy teachings are not in the mainstream!  Yoga (asana) is, but when you get down to how you work with the mind and emotions directly, off the mat, not so much!  This course is designed to change that and is perfect for integration into existing teacher training courses. 
My Career Background

I run a communications consulting company (Myra Godfrey Consulting Inc.), helping people and businesses craft conscious communication and brand strategies.

Strong background in non-profit management and development work (over 7 years of Director level experience).
Over 12 years of experience in crafting targeted communications strategies.
I am an internationally published writer and speaker on spirituality and consciousness! I have recent articles in both the highly acclaimed Yoga Magazine and Tathaastu: So Be It! Magazine.

I have spoken on women's empowerment and spirituality at the United Nations for their week of spirituality and for International Women's Day.

You can find more about my individual consciousness and healing work and find my writings on my personal website Hridaya Healing.
My Spiritual Background
I grew up always being closely connected with God.  When I reached my late 20's I met my first Guru/teacher and took mantra initiation.  This is also where I extensively studied the Gita, learned about meditation and consciousness.
This led to many direct realization experiences and to connecting directly to Source and God through my own heart.  My Guru guided me to go out, teach and to trust my inner guidance because it was clear.
After starting the practice of Sri Vidya (which my inner guidance led me to), the Divine Mother herself came and initiated me into her Panchadasi and Shodasi mantras.  Later, I received full inititation into Sri Vidya, with the caveat from that Guru (Amritananda Natha) that Mother alone was my guide and to keep deepening the realization in my own heart.    I was given the guidance to teach and share what I knew and what I would learn with the world!


What We Need & What You Get
We need to raise $11,000 to get the development of this course started and to increase our ability to reach more people with its message! Your donations will help with:

A real-world ad campaign in NYC focusing on self-empowerment and character development, as originationg form the core Self.
Discussion time with religious leaders of diverse faiths for the commentary section of this book, discussing inter-religious diaogue and interfaith harmony!
Art design for the workbook, including cover and back design.
Some writing time!  Over half of the work is already completed, including the Sanskrit translation! We need to write the commentary and get everything ready for the printing process.
Copyright and Trademark registration for the course.
Overall project and operating support for Gita for the Masses to successfully launch this new course! 

We've developed a very robust rewards program for you....and since we are a non-profit, your contributions will also be tax-deductable! 
Take a look at all of the rewards.  If you have any questions, contact us directly!  I am happy to talk with you by phone or e-mail.  You can find all of the contact info directly on the Gita for the Masses website here: www.gitaforthemasses.org. 


The Impact
Individually:




Learn how powerful the intellect is for shaping your whole life.
How to identify your life purpose and go about fulfilling it.
Inner contemplation and transformation tools.
Self-accountability for thoughts, feelings and actions in life.
Psychological, emotional and consciousness growth.
Self-empowerment and character development.
Learn about the Shakti, feminine energies as they impact the psyche.


On a large scale:



Inter-religious dialogue and interfaith harmony!
Peace-building through fighting the inner war, not the outer one.
Social Change by creating empowered, authentic individuals!
Promote the inherent Oneness between diverse cultures and people
Anti-bullying.
Anti-violence.
Women's empowerment through understanding their core Shakti energy.
A new integrated look at spirituality that embraces all of life.


This is truly a revolutionary project; no one is doing anything like this!  No one is teaching this.  No one has looked at it in quite this way before....and this has the power to change the lives of people in the West for the better.  It has the potential to re-conceptualize the way people relate to their spirituality and core empowered self.
Other Ways You Can Help
There are many ways you can get involved!  Here are some creative ideas for you: 

Share on your social media pages!  Let people know about this powerful and one of a kind work! Indiegogo has great built-in share tools! Check them out!
Contact your local media: people always want to know more about positive, unique projects, especially when they involve empowerment, peace-building, and social change!
Tell your local religious or spiritual community!  Tell your community leaders dedicated to social change!  We look to build dynamic, fulfilling partnerships!
Talk to other inspired change-makers and spread the world!

story:
Hi, 

My name is Fruzsina and I welcome you to my Indiegogo campaign! 

I have been writing in my whole life but several years ago I had a vision of writing a whole series of conscious and spiritual books, called Your Earth, Your World, that would help children (and grown ups) to find, notice and appreciate the beauty of our Planet, each other, the nature and all beings of Earth and beyond.

About 10 moths ago I wrote more than a dozen poem-stories that are undergoing major illustration by an amazing and talented artist, Beatrix-Renata Bihari who is deliberately working on bringing these books alive. 


THE MISSION 

Through these series of stories my mission is to help children AND grown ups increase their conscious connection to Mother Earth and the nature, to build intention to take care of their environment and each other through the power of love and guide them how to walk through life with awareness of peace and love for all.

Reading these books to children or adults this beautiful collection of poetries is to help evoke and expand the divine unconditional love in everyone while promoting spiritual growth and self-awareness.

"BE THE CHANGE YOU WANT TO SEE IN THIS WORLD"...

... as Gandhi said for it'd be truly transformational for people to fully appreciate this beautiful Planet, accept each other for who they are and be grateful for all the things in life. Eliminate judgments, cynicism, negative opinions and thoughts and shine Light onto what is truly important in our World so that we all may live in peace and harmony on this beautiful Earth.


ABOUT THE BOOK SERIES 

You’ll find fun activities and games at the end of each book that is related to the actual theme of the book within the Your Earth, Your World series, which can playfully help bond the whole family together for a good cause. 

 Along with these books I am also recording an audio book combined with the angelic harp music of an amazing award nominated musician Peter Sterling whose music elevates these stories to a whole new level of dimension.

I am also working on an interactive website www.YourEarthYourWorld.com that will have really fun interactive deck of “Good Thoughts, Good Deeds” card for children and parents, a downloadable introduction to meditation and much more.


YOUR CONTRIBUTION 

In order for these books to be on the market in physical forms I need a bit of support. Any pledged support from you will go towards the publishing process, which includes paying my wonderful illustrator, website, promotions and marketing so that millions of children and adults can read these stories and reestablish their connection with the most important things in life.

Below you can see the list of my books that are already written. They are getting illustrated as you read these lines (after the first three titles the exact order is still TBA).

While I love all these wonderful stories to be published on a hard cover, the amount I am asking for is only covering the first four or five books. Unless this campaign is going to surpass itself the remaining books might have to stay e-books for a while or until a huge publisher picks them up. :D Let’s stay optimistic.

#1 Your Earth, Your World (ISBN-13: 978-0615886909 and ISBN-10: 0615886906)

#2 The Meaning Of Love (Two sister's sweet dialogue about the essence of Life) 

#3 The Tree and the Bird (Have you ever wondered who you truly are?)   

#4 Under The Blue Sky  (A rhythmic tale about the beautiful birds of this World) 

#5 Divine Heart (Do you know what it takes to banish fear from your life?) 

#6 Joyce and the Golden Rose (A beautiful friendship of a rose and a little girl) 

#7 Your Magical Mind (A catchy poem book about the true power of your mind!) 

#8 Veggie World (Don't like vegetables at all? Read this fun book to change your mind!) 

#9 The Wise Owl (Hear the true Wisdom of an Owl about thoughts, words and deeds) 

#10 Wisdom of a Tree (...about Love, growth and Life on Earth...from an Oak Tree) 

#11 Breath Of God (Beautiful Poem about the Ocean...)  

#12 Wonderland (Are you a World Changing Star?) 

#13 Captain Of my Ship (Learn how you can control and get rid of any pain) 

#14 Mermaid and the Little Girl (Cute tale about a Mermaid and a girl) 

#15 3 Magic Words (Another wonderful heartfelt story in rhythm about Your true essence) 


LET'S CO-CREATE! 

There are many ways to be involved in this project: 

1, You can pledge here on the right and be part of this movement 

2, You can share this campaign with your friends (Facebook and other Social Media)

3, You may collaborate with the development of this project (Feel free to contact me) 


YOUR GIFTS

Any contribution that comes from the heart matters and I thank you. As a form of giving I put together some really fun gift packages (see on the right) from these options below: 

  • Eco Friendly, Recycled Bookmarks with Flower Seeds that you can plant! 
  • An original Illustration from the book
  • YEYW Audio Book, e-books and Hard Cover Books  
  • The 'Miraculous You" Poster 
  • 100% Recycled Your Earth, Your World T-shirts with non-toxic water based ink YeeeeaaaY! 
  • Published Book donations to Youth Centers and Homeless Shelters for Women with Children  


THE TEAM

Author: Fruzsina Varga  http://yourearthyourworld.com/ 

Illustrator: Beatrix-Renata Bihari  http://bexylogia.blogspot.hu/p/mese-vilag.html 

Audio Book Music by Peter Sterling  http://www.harpmagic.com/

Editor: Klara Clark


THE VISION OF THE FUTURE

My grandiose vision is to donate a portion of the published books to as many youth centers, detention facilities and homeless children as possible. 

If and when I surpass the money asked for this campaign I am also going to create a non-profit organization to help and guide children and youth to find strength within, despite of hardships and difficult circumstances. Thinking of my past this is the greatest inspiration for me. 

In this non-profit organization we will teach a variety of meditation techniques, self-empowerment and assist in self-healing, help increase self-awareness and through a variety of classes teach life essential tools to support the next generation’s inner growth.

If you feel called to help this awesome project or be part of it to move it forward in any way, please feel free to contribute in whatever way you wish here to the right or through http://yourearthyourworld.com/

I thank you either way for taking your time to read this through. I am forever grateful for all contributions and even if the only thing you can do is just to share it with as many people as you can I thank you from the depth of my heart. 

In Love and Light, 

Fruzsina

story:
To Our Fabulous Community,

Amazing news: SALACIOUS Magazine has officially become a sponsored project of Fractured Atlas, a non-profit arts service organization. What does this mean? This means that, should the sexy spirit move you, if you choose to donate to SALACIOUS, your donation can be tax-deductible.

We here at SALACIOUS HQ donï¿½t get paid for our time. We are currently operating at a loss, and we are all volunteering our time between other ventures to give you, our rockinï¿½ community, a fresh take on queer feminist sexuality. SALACIOUS is able to be sleek, glossy, and well-curated because we strongly believe in our work, despite the fact that it is not (at least at this moment) financially viable.

Right now, Katie takes full financial responsibility for all travel, printed materials, magazine printing, stickers, postcards, web-stuff... You get the idea. By donating to us via our awesome new sponsor status, youï¿½ll not only be able to make your donation tax-deductible, potentially get a sweet freebie, and have they feel-good feeling in your sexy heart--youï¿½ll be able to guarantee SALACIOUS retains its high print quality and full-color goodness.

Click here to donate: http://www.indiegogo.com/SALACIOUS-Magazine

So, thanks in advance! Youï¿½re fabulous.

Rock on,
kd diamond
SALACIOUS Founder and Art Director

story:
Help a Sheep and a Shark to Go LA! 

 

Who I am and why I need you:

I am a writer, speaker and trainer for more than 12 years. Right now I am located near Frankfurt/Germany, and I am about to build up a home and office in Los Angeles.

In October I will fly to LA together with sheep WILMA, dolphin SILBERFLOSSE, shark HARKO, MARIE, LISA and LUCY - all main characters of my books - and present them and their stories to my business contacts. This is the point where you come in!

Because, if this trip is successful, and helps me to let my network grow by having as many meetings as possible with potential partners from the publishing business and the movie business, then this is going to be the kick-off for readings, workshops, creative projects of all kinds, and for bringing my books successfully to LA and to the US!

My professional partners and my clients know that I would give my last shirt (as we would say here in Germany) to support projects - my own and yours - and to make sure that a great success is always a WIN-WIN-WIN situation. 

I love this platform, because together we can bring our best work out into the world - and get something great back in exchange! 

I need you to reach a goal only few people in Germany dare to dream of: to bring my creative work into the US and into the whole world. Please, support me and I will do my very best to help you bring out yours!

 

What I Need and What You Get:

The money will be spent for the flight (1000 Euros), accommodation (1500 Euros), meals and meetings with potential partners. 

I am looking forward to give you something great and exciting back:

  • For $ 5: You get my setcard with your name on it!
  • For $ 150: You get an half-an-hour personal coaching with me!
  • For $ 300: You spend 1 hour live with me, and will get answers to all your questions on writing, creativity and your personal success!
  • For $ 2500: You can show your banner on my website for 6 months!
  • And for $4 000: You and your business are visible on my website for a whole year - 365 days!

I will fly to Los Angeles end of October for 10 days, independent of reaching the entire goal or not. Your money will be spent wisely and carefully, and it will nurture me wherever I go. Every coffee, every sandwich or soup will be enjoyed by me thinking of you and your wonderful support. Thank you!

 

Why you are safe:

Please, take time and visit my website for more information about me, my work and my books. You can also find all my books on Amazon and in bookstores. I want you to feel comfortable and safe supporting me - so please feel free to write me an e-mail, if you have any question! 

www.angermayer-online.com (1 page in English)

Thanks for your time!

 

You don´t have the money, but would like to help me?

Here are other ways of support that I very much appreciate:

Success is a a matter of focus, energy, the right time and the right people.

If you have good connections to the US publishing business or the film industry, please let me know. Other contacts such as to translaters, editors, agencies ... are also very welcome!

My claim is "words that work". I helped hundreds of people in the past years to find their voice and express it on paper, to bring out their stories, and to create ads that really worked and reached the heart of their customers.

I am now following the call of my heart to go to the US to make my contribution. So wherever you are, and whoever comes into your mind that could need my skills and my spirit - for this project or anything else! - please take a little time, write me an e-mail, and let me know.

You can be sure that I will figure out something in return that is of great value for you and your work.

Please, use the Indiegogo share tools, and your own tools (mailing lists, newsletters ...).

THANK YOU.

Be blessed and inspired!

Yours, Karen

Here are other ways of support that I very much appreciate:
Success is a a matter of focus, energy, the right time and the right people.
If you have good connections to the US publishing business or the film industry, please let me know. Other contacts such as to translaters, editors, agencies ... are also very welcome!
My claim is "words that work". I helped hundreds of people in the past years to find their voice and express it on paper, to bring out their stories, and to create ads that really worked and reached the heart of their customers.
I am now following the call of my heart to go to the US to make my contribution. So wherever you are, and whoever comes into your mind that could need my skills and my spirit - for this project or anything else! - please take a little time, write me an e-mail, and let me know.
You can be sure that I will figure out something in return that is of great value for you and your work.
Please, use the Indiegogo share tools, and your own tools (mailing lists, newsletters ...).
THANK YOU.
Be blessed and inspired!
Yours, Karen

story:
Since 2007, The Arts Fuse has been covering arts and culture events in Greater Boston and New England. 

In July 2012, we celebrate our 5th birthday and are doing it in style by raising funds to help us pay more of our writers and editors.

We want to keep producing great free editorial coverage for Boston and New England, along with increasing our marketing activities so our readership keeps growing.

Since The Arts Fuse is a web-only arts magazine, we have no overhead costs: no offices or desks, satellite dishes or printing presses or delivery trucks, so your donations will go directly to the writers themselves!

Check back soon, as we will be adding new perks with other writers and critics. 

Since The Arts Fuse began publishing in July 2007, it has dramatically increased editorial coverage of the arts and culture across Greater Boston with in-depth criticism, previews, interviews, and commentary covering theater, music, dance, visual arts, film, and food. 

With more than 1,000 articles published, The Arts Fuse is providing the next-generation platform for thousands of arts and culture consumers across Greater Boston and beyond. 

In reaction to the declining arts coverage in newspapers, magazines, radio, and television, Editor-in-Chief Bill Marx started The Arts Fuse as a non-profit organization that could experiment with professional online arts criticism, looking at new and innovative ways to use the online platforms to evolve the conversation and bring together critics, readers, and artists. 

The Arts Fuse has now become home for more than 50 contributing writers, critics, and editors across New England, including: 

• Debra Cash (The Boston Globe, WBUR)

• Harvey Blume (The New York Times, The Boston Globe, Wired, Agni)

• Franklin Einspruch (The New Criterion, the Weekly Dig, Big Red & Shiny)

• Helen Epstein (Culture Vulture, author of six books of literary non-fiction)

• Steve Elman (The Boston Globe, The Boston Phoenix, WBUR) 

The Arts Fuse has also helped elevate some of New England’s rising stars in arts writing, including:

• Jonathan Blumhofer (composer and violinist)

• Daniel Bosch (poet published in The New Republic, Poetry, Slate, The TLS, The Paris Review)

• Grace Dane Mazur (author of “Hinges: Meditations on the Portals of the Imagination”)

• Molly Jay (City Living Magazine)

• Sally Levitt Steinberg (food muse; author of The Donut Book and The Book of Joy)

...and many others. 

For more than two decades, Marx wrote about arts and culture for print, broadcast, and online media outlets including WBUR, WGBH, NPR, The Boston Globe, The Boston Phoenix, Washington Post Book World, the Nation, the Boston Review, The Los Angeles Times, the Columbia Journalism Review, and The Village Voice. 

Marx won United Press International and Associated Press awards for his radio reviews of Boston theater. He has been a finalist for the National Book Critics Circle Reviewer’s Citation three times.

story:
MAR 1st UPDATE: The time frame for art submissions is now over.

FEB 17th UPDATE: submission deadline is extended to February 29th. Pls note images submitted must contain orbs and/or circles.

 

Who’s doing what?

I'm Cindy O'Neil, the fourth daughter of six to my departed parents - at last they get some peace. My IndieGoGo quest is to publish a remarkable book that I began creating in the winter of 2001 in the midst of a long-term and life altering health change.


Having just been released from a month long stay in hospital and diagnosed with severe, systemic Rheumatoid Arthritis I was in a very transformed, painful and shockingly creative space. Confined to home by disability, healing became my full time job. This involved anything that would buoy my health and spirit. One such anything was doing word puzzles.


Many a day dissolved as I played with words. At some point ideas for puzzles began to spill over my mind. I was so engrossed in making these puzzles that I’d be up till all hours just picking themes, researching words, places etc. In the process my pain and fear evaporated, I was healing - my Healing Circle Puzzles project was born.

 

What's so unique about this book?

From my research this type of book hasn’t been done before. My Healing Circle Puzzles book combines original works of art with unusually crafted word search puzzles. Throughout the book full colour images by very talented undiscovered artists will accompany each word search. The artist bios/websites will also be featured.


I created the puzzles in a time when I was healing. But I didn’t want to make just any puzzles, the whole thing about healing and circles and the world and connection all came into the concept of my puzzle making, so I challenged myself and decided that they’d only be in circles. I didn’t use a special program; I designed the puzzles by hand then figured out how to make them on the computer.

All of the puzzles have themes of things that were helping me in my healing; positive thoughts, actions, music, books, therapies, healthy foods and more.  The contents of the book focus on connectedness, harmony, healing, unity.

Why I want to do this?

When I was creating these puzzles one of the forces that inspired me was the thought that someday they might be of help to someone else. Someone who was in hospital, people who were house bound due to health or injury. I hoped that one day my little project may bring other people release, joy or uplifting perspective.


Through my health change two energies - gratitude and acknowledgement - repeatedly manifested in ways that kept me fed, housed and safe. Since my health change I’ve been in deep financial debt, yet by way of gratitude and acknowledgement the Universe has provided. In honour of this I want to support and feature the talent of others in any way possible. Taking the risks and actions to publish my Healing Circle Puzzles book is one splendid way I can do so.

What We Need

I've previously self published two books, one in hard copy and the other as an e-book. This is the first time that I’ve sought financial assistance for a book project - overdraft and credit are my usual sources of funding :). I can say with experience that publishing is costly in more than just monetary ways. I've already invested months developing the puzzles, the cover art and part of the book design. The next steps are putting the pieces into a complete product.


I’m going to start with an e-book version, it won’t be as grand as the print version, but it will make the Healing Circle Puzzles book more accessible to people around the world. To launch and (pre)market the book a website is required. I’ve gotten a quote to have a website template designed. Once the template is complete I will input content to reduce financial costs. Advance marketing of the project will help to establish demand which will determine first run print quantities.


Now for the really fun stuff; finding original art for the Healing Circle Puzzles book. Let this be the official call to painters, photographers and graphic artists’ world wide. I’ll be including 20 images in the book that are original works of art. If you are an undiscovered artist stay tuned…

(Feb 5th update): The image submission guidelines are now posted.

An FAQs page has been created to answer questions artists have about submitting art.

 

Next is the formatting and basic layout of both the e-book and print editions of the Healing Circle Puzzles. I will be working with a printing house for this aspect of the project - it needs to be done correctly and efficiently so I’m leaving it to an expert.

Project Development Costs:
$2000 - payment to artists featured in book (20 artists in total, $100 per artist)
$  880 - book website template
$  380 - e-book formatting
$  600 - basic book design/layout at printing house


Here’s where you come in. $3860.00 will get the Healing Circle Puzzles project underway and that’s the financial goal for this campaign. Other than faith, organization and staying power, $3860 is what is needed to complete the puzzle. I’ll do the work but I need your support.

Why so little an amount? My objective is to use funds from e-book and (pre)sales of the Healing Circle Puzzles book to pay for printing. That’s why a website and professional book formatting are essential. The printed edition will be made available when it can pay for itself.

The Healing Circle Puzzles project started from a realm of gratitude and healing. In that spirit I’m inviting you to participate from the heart - please contribute an amount appropriate for you.

If I had a dollar for every time I didn’t have a penny (that’s a lyric line from a song I’m writing) this project would be long completed. I can honestly say that it sucks to be broke. So what happens if I don’t reach the goal amount?  You’ll get some great perks and I’ll be doing house work for my future mother-in-law so that I can complete this project.


What You Get

On the topic of perks, please cast your eyes to the right of your screen. All the perks include my deep gratitude and acknowledgment. Please know that any financial contribution you make to this campaign is of extreme value to me. I know that many of you are in a tight spot and others are looking for ways that you can share your abundance. While the amount is important, ultimately the vital thing is that you’ve chosen to be part of the circle. The act of giving what you can because you want to help is the core of healing and the circle.


Other Ways You Can Help

Puzzles are all about connecting, one part always leads you to another. Please be part of my puzzle, use the IndieGoGo share tools to connect with people in your world about this project. Facebook, LinkdIn, Twitter, email, snail mail even an old fashioned phone call, they’ll all be appreciated...

So much so that I'll give you a free download of one of my songs when you share this project with others. Just email to pzl.part [at] gmail dot com with a link or screen shot of where you shared the Healing Circle Puzzles project.

I'm really looking forward to giving you the first update on this project. 

Thanks very much for your time and interest.

with light,

Cindy

story:
What is this Campaign about ?

My Girlfriend and I are writing each one an own book (2 different Views from our Story) which is really interesting Material.

It just HAS to be spreaded!

These Books are about all! .....And all is true!

I don't even know in which Category I should sort these books. They are a mix of Drama, Romance, Thriller and Erotic combined. All in One.


My Dream is to Self-publish this all as a REAL BOOK but for this we need way more Money and it's a very complicated process.

 

What does the story tell?

(I cannot tell all otherwise the books make no sense anymore)

 

Our Story is so long I don't even know where to start. I am a German Guy of 36 Years old who has never fallen really in love before until the moment I met an Argentinian girl on Facebook (yes, really on *Facebook) who changed ALL MY LIFE and also hers. After a long time chatting (over a Year, to be sure it's not just a bit of feelings and after many problems with her family) over the Internet (webcam etc.) I decided to go away from Germany to finally meet her in Argentina. I sold all I had, from my Computer to my bed, my Wardrobe, my Couch. As you can read, ALL.

I gave up my Life completely to follow my heart and be with her in Argentina. So far so good. The step was big but we were prepared. I arrived and life went fine but that changed drastically. It all happened from one moment to the other: family problems, money problems, job problems. All things went against us. The worst happened when the family took her away from me, they separated us and I had to travel around in a country with a language and culture unknown to me and completely different to mine . I came to Villages with very weird people. Nothing to eat, nothing to drink and nearly no contact to my Love. We came back together after a lot of struggle but things were still very complicated. It came so bad that we had no Home anymore and we had to live on the Streets and then went to an Institution for the Homeless where we had to live with criminals and very weird people. (see the picture of the House in the Gallery).

Although things got a bit better now we are still struggling with money issues. We are also awaiting a little prince or princess.

That all is only a very small snippet of all what happened to us.

*Facebook: Normally, we have to ask Mark Z. for help as he is one of the responsibles of this DRAMA. ;)

What will you get when you help?

  • First of all, a Story that normally should be in the Cinema. So much Drama can only be written by Life! And you can read it, if you want.

     

  • You will get (if you want so) the ebook in German, English and my Girlfriend is also writing HER side of all the Story in Spanish.

 

In all this time my Girl always believed in us and never gave us up, even when it was the worst of the worst and we had a very hard time. And yes, also a lot of stress. Love motivates! Please dear friends...if you have 1 Euro over I would like to thank you from the bottom of my Heart..THANK YOU.

story:
We all cherish the memories of when our parents read to us at bedtime.
But what about those children who don't have someone to read to them?
Our hope is to make sure these children are not forgotten. And with
your help they won't be.

The Bear-Time Stories Project allows people all over the world to
donate a bedtime story by reading it aloud and sending it to us. These
stories are then put on a mp3 player built into a stuffed animal and
given to parentless children who'll remember your voice for years to
come.

Why Bedtime Stories?

In our opinion a bedtime story is a highlight for every child. It
sparks the kid's imagination and influences their entire childhood.
Studies show that reading to kids before bedtime also helps to
develop listening abilities, vocabulary, creativity and oral
communication skills. But perhaps the biggest benefit comes from an
even more basic truth: that when a child is read to, they feel loved.

Where does my money go?

Our aim is to provide as many children with stories as possible. Our
project is a non-profit program, therefore every pledge will directly
go into realizing this aim by buying bears with the inserted audio technology. Additionally covering up the cost of transport of our giveaways to various
orphanages and children's rescues is required.  If we don't reach our aim, all the money that has been contributed will still go directly towards these goals.

What is the purpose of the Bears?

The bears are the medium to bring the digital recorded stories to the
children. The children can snuggle up to it at bedtime listening to
your story.

Will I see the results?

We will constantly update our news on this project. Our website will
show how many people recorded stories, how many teddies are prepared
and where everything went by uploading photos, texts or even press
related attention. But probably the greatest result will be a happy kid goes on to become a happy adult.

Who are we?

We are a group of Copywriters and Art Directors from all around the World using our creativity to make the world a better place. We have experienced what impact a simple idea can have therefore we founded this project. We love what we do so that we gratefully want to give something back.
