Your name in a Special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Book introduction and the opportunity to review and provide feedback on an early copy of my manuscript
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my book cover
An invitation to a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
And more...
 About the Author Danielle Hawa Tarigha is a fourth-year student at the University of Chicago studying economics. With internship experience in investment banking, public policy, information technology, and asset management, writing about global poverty alleviation was far from the subjects that she felt most familiar with; yet her lack of experience in the area is exactly why she wrote the book.Danielle sought out to answer the questions of people who want to make a difference but don’t know where to start. She decided that the questions she had about extreme poverty likely weren’t unique and wanted to answer them in a straight-forward way because educating others about extreme poverty is a key component of eradicating it. Outside of her writing and research, Danielle likes to pursue her passion for fashion on Instagram.For more information, you can connect with Danielle via email at danielle.tarigha@gmail.com and on Social Media — Twitter: @danielle_hawa Instagram: @danielle__hawa). Risks & Challenges The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and ultimately publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. When you do, please use #UpliftandEmpower and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can amplify your efforts!You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it as a text message or Direct Message on social media to spread the word if you are willing.Thank you so much for all of your love and support!Thanks again,Danielle Hawa Tarigha

story:
Update

I can't even believe it! A heartfelt thank you for supporting with the completion of Phase 1-3 of my campaign. I will now be able to publish the following: Ebook, Paperback, Hardcover, and Audiobook. This feels absolutely surreal and I am filled with gratitude. 

NEW GOAL: $10,000 and beyond (Dare I say more) to have more people join my author's community as beta readers! I would also like to raise $1,000 or more for the local charity below. 

*25% of all Proceeds above $6K will go to Mindful Life Project* [$500 already raised] 

 

Story of My Book 

Bringing Consciousness to Education is a book reimagining the education system by shifting outdated educational paradigms and integrating key consciousness components into classrooms.

---
My name is Komal Shah and I am the author of Bringing Consciousness to Education. I wrote this book because, after being a public school teacher for five years, I became frustrated by the current educational system’s main focus and measure of success - good grades and college acceptance rates.

In my classroom, it became obvious to me that my students could also use space to cultivate their curiosity and playful spirit—their innate gifts. I realized that as an educator, I was not considering nor teaching my students holistically - meaning that I was not teaching them how to be truly successful in life.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the educational system has more to offer children than good grades and college acceptance rates. That is an old paradigm; an outdated view on what education can offer students. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for our children and the cultivation of consciousness. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you see a new vision for our educational system.

In this book, you'll learn about problems in our current system and consciousness integration for a new future. You'll hear stories ranging from personal accounts of being a teacher and interacting with my students, all the way to stories from 70+ educators on their frustration with the educational system.

You will love this book if you you feel frustrated by the current educational system and aspire for educational reform, have a desire to teach students how to be truly successful in life, and want a better way to teach and develop your child.

Bringing Consciousness to Education is a nonfiction book that speaks to educational leaders, teachers, and parents who have a desire to educate the whole child in a new way.
 

Bringing Consciousness to Education

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1 - 3. These chapters focus on the current educational system and its outdated paradigms such as how the focus on academic achievement is leading to increased anxiety in children, and how the rat race has contributed to the increasing mental health crisis in our world.

Part 2 contains chapters 3 - 9. These chapters focus on the numerous consciousness components and their possible impact on students such as building space for authenticity, capacity for emotional awareness, and focusing on trauma-based instruction.

Part 3 contains chapters 10 - 12. These chapters focus on the steps on how to successfully integrate these consciousness components into our current system such as self-awareness and a shift in mindset.

 

What I Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The  launch & promotion effects for my book when I ultimately publish this in the Fall. 


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author 

Komal Shah is an educational consultant and thought leader whose desire and vision is to use educational spaces to raise up conscious children, equipping them to later become conscious adults.

Shah spent five years in the Teach for America program as a middle school educator, but she was left wanting more. She wanted more for her kids, all kids; she wanted more out of the education system as a whole. To pursue this dream, she attended USC Marshall School of Business where she received her MBA. Her vision is to have each child leaving the educational system as a mindful, connected, fulfilled young adult.

Outside of her passion for education, Shah loves to connect with nature and enjoy the present moment with her loved ones. She grew up Bollywood dancing which energizes her, but can also be found in the corner of her room with a good book and some hot tea.

For more information, you can connect with Komal Shah on LinkedIn, at consult@thekomalshah.com, or @consultkomal on Instagram.

 

International Preorders 

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #consciouseducation and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support. I feel so lucky to have you a part of this journey, and look forward to transforming education for our future children. 

Thanks again, 
Komal Shah

story:
In recent years, new technologies hustled the world of transportation. The search for customer satisfaction was first experienced great development late 2008/2010 to become a true competitive advantage. In this race to services, good Customer Service is critical and represents a fundamental competitive advantage because it is, in fact, more difficult to copy: a good Customer Service presupposes, beyond the intrinsic quality of products and services, perfect coordination and cooperation between the different services of the company. New technologies for their part, helped boost the sector, particularly through the development of social networks.
The study of customer satisfaction originates in a simple question: how customers perceive the service of a company? From a service? In fact, customer-satisfaction survey beyond the strict framework of the measure of a satisfaction because it is primarily a market opportunity of listening, carrying important marketing implications: how to anticipate needs and customer expectations in order to change the company offer? How to identify and implement the "more" of the service, loyalty factor? How to better communicate its strengths to customers and prospects? In the airport world answer these questions challenge. Indeed, an airport environment is very anxiety provoking for its users on the one hand and airports themselves are waging a war of "Hub" to attract customers on one platform over another.
So how to get to a rising channel information of its users while taking into account the aggressive environment? The experience of airlines and airport operator in terms of quality surveys for example, amounts to a stardust and much remains below what they could get such information from their users. The anxiety factor of airports has much .. lack of time, stress, anxiety, excitement ... to prevent the time today to conduct investigations peaceful, comprehensive and revealing expectations of these same passengers.
The only place where it can start to listen to any investigation would be boarding room .. There close his plane one sees and knows to wear hand. But now, this is the moment chosen by the client to relax. Difficult in these conditions to conduct through investigations. Many experiments have been conducted by specialized external firms ... but it is to consider that these are issues of management and not passenger expectations. Counters with smiley (I like / I do not like) sometimes demanding an appreciation to a passenger and tries to steal the few seconds it will devote to press the button. Also needs to change attitude, both in the methods and manner of perceiving the client.
Do not consider it as a client "ROI" but take into account as an alter ego, the company's partner. The correlation between satisfaction and customer-loyalty is an obvious and valid argument because, as we often hear, "retain a customer is much cheaper than acquiring a new"
Social media has become a preferred method for customers to interact with airports, especially when they are having a bad experience at services.
Begening 2012, in the Top 25 of the most "social" airports, 20 were American, and only two located in Europe: Airport Schiphol Amesterdam (16th) and London Heathrow (20th). According to ACI Europe Annual Report in 2012*, only 77% of European airports were present on social networks, especially Facebook and Twitter. This could it be linked to the delay the European airports took to offer free wifi to their customers? The emphasis being placed on social media is highlighted in the latest Airport IT Trends Survey by SITA, which states that managing customer relations via social media is on the rise, with 30% of airports using social media to improve customer relations in 2014; a figure that is expected to increase by a further 40% by 2017 (FTE 2015 source). KOUIK Agency, already running a website dedicated to airport benchmark (www.airportbenchmarking.com) will offer to all airports beginning of 2017 a mobile app “ Airport Advisor” in order to help airports to enhance their Passenger experience. This app will allow all passengers at any airport to grade services. From the car park to the boarding. One app, one unique place that will list all passengers comments. No more need, to be on Twitter, Facebook and other social media. A real time saving. And a greater efficiency. If your airport is interested by this project, if you want to be part of this new challenge Please contact us for more details at : contact@airport-advisor.com

We wil give you more details about the project

French version :

Airport Adivisor est une application mobile qui vise à recenser les avis des passagers qui utilisent les aérogares du monde entier et noter les services offerts par les plateformes. Mais également de permettre aux usagers, de faire des suggestions et propositions d’amélioration de services.

Crée par le webmaster de http://www.airportbenchmarking.com, de chez KOUIK Agency

( porfolio et recommandations en ligne, http://www.kouikagency.com), cette application vise à  aider à renforcer l’expérience client des passagers.

Après plusieurs mois de benchmark autour des aéroports du monde, il ressort  que les passagers d'aujourd'hui exigent plus de contrôle sur leur voyage dans  les aéroports, et c’est ce qui va façonner la façon dont les aéroports vont interagir avec eux à l'avenir.

L’appli mobile « Airport Advisor » vise à accompagner les entreprises aéroportuaires dans la mutation de l’expérience client.

Service innovant (une première mondiale), Airport Advisor donne la parole aux voyageurs du monde, leur permettant de noter les services offerts par tous les intervenants d’une plateforme aéroportuaire. Du Parking à l’embarquement, à chaque étape de son voyage, le client pourra apprécier les services offerts.

Par ce biais, l’appli Airport Advisor offre une mise en  avant d’un service numérique innovant et à l’écoute de ses clients.

Airport Advisor va permettre de ne plus le considérer un client  comme « ROI » mais de  le prendre en compte un comme l'alter ego, partenaire des entreprises aéroportuaires.

Comment anticiper les besoins et les attentes des clients afin de faire évoluer l’offre de l’entreprise ? Comment identifier et mettre en place les "plus" de la prestation, facteur de fidélisation ?

Comment mieux communiquer ses points forts auprès des clients et des prospects ?

Mesurer la satisfaction aujourd’hui ne suffit plus. Si l’on ne se compare pas à la concurrence et si on n'analyse pas la performance globale. L'enjeu demain est de vendre de l'audience satisfaite.

Les 3 critères incontournables à prendre en compte aujourd’hui sont :

• l'écoute,

• la reconnaissance,

• la réactivité.

C'est dans ce but, qu'Airport Advisor a besoin de fonds : 90 000 euros, pour finaliser son projet.

Il sera soutenu par des campagnes SEO+ SEA et tous les réseaux sociaux habituels et adaptés.

S'appuyant sur le réseau professionnel d'Airport Benchmarking ( plus de 2700 visites de pros par mois et lu dans 54 pays) et sur les bloggeurs influenceurs pour la partie voyageurs.

Une mise en ligne en version Béta est prévue fin novembre début décembre.

La rédaction des CGV confiées à un cabinet spécialisé en matière de nouvelle technologies.

Je vous joins un bench effectué en langue anglaise et disponible sur le site Airport Benchmarking ainsi que sur LinkeIn.

 

Karima KOUIDRI

www.kouikagency.com

story:
"The Original Punk Parent Zine." Ariel Gore 

"Martens has been writing since long before the mommy wars were a media trope, but her work is a powerful response to punditry casting institutional and political problems as personal issues of 'work-life balance' for mothers (notably, not fathers)." - Lisa Jervis, Bitch Magazine

China Martens started The Future Generation, a pioneer of the genre, especially when it comes to mamazines, in 1990. She was a young anarchist punk rock mother who didn't feel that the mamas in her community had enough support, so she began publishing articles on radical parenting in an age before the Internet made such a thing easy. 

Atomic Books published The Future Generation: The Zine-Book For Subculture Parents, Friends, & Others in 2007, an anthology of the best from issues of The Future Generation, the zine. For the first time, the 16 years of her zine and parenting writing life came together. This zine-book used individual issues as chapters, focused on personal writing, and retained the character of a zine that changed over the years—growing from her daughter’s birth to teenagehood and beyond. 

NOW – with your help – we will publish the tenth year anniversary, second edition!!! Help get The Future Generation back in print again!!!

Pre-order and get a signed second edition copy delivered to your house in October, 2017! With a new color cover and ALL NEW AFTERWORD written by China's daughter. And many other exciting zine perks. 

Why you should support (in any way that you can) this campaign:

Because China Martens is an awesome writer and thinker! 

To celebrate the past and gather strength for the future!

Because it is a historic 10th year commemorative issue of badass fierceness!

TFG remains a timeless resource for parents, caregivers and those who care about them. Though first published in 1990, many of the essays and observations--about parenting, children, and surviving in a hostile political climate--still ring true today.

To support a local (Baltimore) small press – Atomic Book Company.  

Because Writing is Important to envision a better world! And it’s a terrible job. 

Because this zine-book is her life’s work and putting it back in print gives it a chance to share with a wider audience and live on.

Because China's grown 28-year-old daughter is going to write a new updated afterword – and you know you want to read that!!!!!!

It’s the Anti-trump thing to do! Support single mother stories.

This book is a documentation of the visceral, day to day, experience of being a poor, single mother in the 90s. What it was like to be a poor single mother during 'welfare reform' and how it affected the day to day life of poor mothers.

Because it’s the only publication of its kind, a vital alternative, and much needed resource.  

Because this book will inspire a new generation of artists and mothers trying to survive.

Parenting is a political act and we need a network to build a sustainable future – for everyone – not just individuals or individual family members but all people everywhere.

Navigating our world under its current political climate requires alternatives if we are going to survive. This book is necessary now and into the future to provide vision and camaraderie. 

The next four years are going to be especially demanding for those trying to balance parenting, politics, and survival. We're going to need the voices and experiences in TFG now more than ever.

Because the future generation is our only hope!

-----

Product Dimensions: 10.4 x 7 x 0.7 inches.

Shipping Weight: 1.2 pounds

234 pages

Atomic Books had a figure from the printers we used last time for 8 thousand dollars, and two thousand was needed for shipping and expenses. I tried as hard as I could, but I could not raise that amount of money in the time frame we set the campaign up for. I am doing this a second time with a smaller goal, and flexible platform, that I can achieve. I am working on various new strategies. I need the money from preorders to get this book off the ground because no one wants to print it, at the size it is at, without some money put in for the printing expenses. That is because the book is so large, it is not economical to put it out at the size it is at.  I just want the book to be able to come out, at the size it is with all the graphics and ect. that are true to the spirit of the zine, one more time. 

LINKS

Original Campaign:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thefutureg... 

Media:

Radio: Talking about the kickstarter on the Marc Steiner Show:  http://www.steinershow.org/podcasts/china-marte...

Interview: "The Future is Radical" MARIAHADESSA EKERE TALLIE INTERVIEWS CHINA MARTENS ON THE FUTURE GENERATION’S 10TH ANNIVERSARY @ hipmama: 

http://hipmamazine.com/china-martens-future-gen...

Review: The Future Generation: The Original Punk Parent Zine, by Lamesha @FakeFrenchGirl:

http://fakefrenchgirl.com/2017/01/the-future-ge...

Review: Book Review by Jordannah Elizabeth at Publik/Private

https://publikprivate.org/2017/01/17/pp-book-re...

More about me and my other books:

http://www.pmpress.org/content/article.php/Chin...

Bio: China Martens is a Baltimore writer and a zinestress extraordinaire. She is the author/co-editor of three books. Her first book, "The Future Generation", is a compilation of 16 years of her first zine. She is also the co-editor of "Don't Leave Your Friends Behind: Concrete Ways To Support Families In Social Justice Movements & Communities" and "Revolutionary Mothering: Love On The Front Lines."
story_txt: "The Original Punk Parent Zine." Ariel Gore "Martens has been writing since long before the mommy wars were a media trope, but her work is a powerful response to punditry casting institutional and political problems as personal issues of 'work-life balance' for mothers (notably, not fathers)." - Lisa Jervis, Bitch MagazineChina Martens started The Future Generation, a pioneer of the genre, especially when it comes to mamazines, in 1990. She was a young anarchist punk rock mother who didn't feel that the mamas in her community had enough support, so she began publishing articles on radical parenting in an age before the Internet made such a thing easy. Atomic Books published The Future Generation: The Zine-Book For Subculture Parents, Friends, & Others in 2007, an anthology of the best from issues of The Future Generation, the zine. For the first time, the 16 years of her zine and parenting writing life came together. This zine-book used individual issues as chapters, focused on personal writing, and retained the character of a zine that changed over the years—growing from her daughter’s birth to teenagehood and beyond. NOW – with your help – we will publish the tenth year anniversary, second edition!!! Help get The Future Generation back in print again!!!Pre-order and get a signed second edition copy delivered to your house in October, 2017! With a new color cover and ALL NEW AFTERWORD written by China's daughter. And many other exciting zine perks. Why you should support (in any way that you can) this campaign:Because China Martens is an awesome writer and thinker! To celebrate the past and gather strength for the future!Because it is a historic 10th year commemorative issue of badass fierceness!TFG remains a timeless resource for parents, caregivers and those who care about them. Though first published in 1990, many of the essays and observations--about parenting, children, and surviving in a hostile political climate--still ring true today.To support a local (Baltimore) small press – Atomic Book Company.  Because Writing is Important to envision a better world! And it’s a terrible job. Because this zine-book is her life’s work and putting it back in print gives it a chance to share with a wider audience and live on.Because China's grown 28-year-old daughter is going to write a new updated afterword – and you know you want to read that!!!!!!It’s the Anti-trump thing to do! story:
Our Story

Hey friends and completly extrangers, I already got my gear, staff, backpack, I have lost 40 pounds so far and 60 more going on in order to walk the Camino de Santiago de Compostela, I need to get my flight ticket to make it and $1300 is needed to achieve it, want to help.???................ not a retoric question actually.


The Impact

As you know I've been preparing this trip for a couple of years, reading  guides, getting info. arranging the schedule, getting in fit, losing weight, setting goals, mind focus " Dont Stop Believing" looking for doing this pilgrimage, so by supporting with your contributions I'll  make it happen.


What We Need & What You Get

Of course I need you send your contributions,  in return wel'll carry your name and petitions to be blessed at the Cathedral de Obradoirio at Santiago de Compostela and ask to burn them at the huge incense thurible called Botafumeiro, so please  share this campaing with your contacts, spread the voice ( and the wealth) , I need just $1300.00 to get my flight ticket from Honduras to Spain before it gets to expensive


Other Ways You Can Help

Make some noise, Word of mouth, cheers, Good Vibs, Happy Thoughts, Good Karma as reward please share this campaing.

story:
Jayme Nimick

For the last year I have been working on my first novel, currently titled "Blessed Bea", and writing a witty and radically honest blog account of the experience.  My blog can be found at http://www.FormerSuburbanMom.com.

The next steps in the dream are to connect with a group of my contemporaries in the literary field, make a final review of my manuscript, and begin complete submissions to agents and publishers.

"Write" is the perfect workshop to bring "Blessed Bea" the next step closer to being published.  The full details of the workshop can be found at http://lifephotographed.com/doe-bay-writers-workshop/ 

URGENT NOTE:  There is a 14 day time limit to this fundraiser as there are only 25 spots in the workshop. Registration opens JANUARY 25TH and they will go quickly!

I have tightened the proverbial belt as far as I can - cancelled cable TV, stopped coloring my hair, and sold off the unecessary portions of the life I share with my two young daughters in order to fund and continue working towards the dream of authorship.  Please help me to make "Write" a possibility.

Writers Are Not Islands

In perfect irony we spend a lot of time alone in front of our computers writing about the human experience.

For our works to find their greatest positive impact, writers need people.  

We need readers, of course.  We need to see our works helping people, making people laugh or cry, and ideally changing people and the world at large.

But firstly we need gifted literary people in workshops exactly like this one to connect and ideate with.  

The value of this workshop is: 1) The input of successful writers on my work and process.  2)  The experience of these writers as to "how-to" bring a work from a dream to a published reality.  And 3)  The potential relationships that are formed during weekends exactly like this, which will affect my career, my works, and my life from that point forward. 

What is Needed for What, And What You Will Get!

The all-inclusive workshop registration fee is $250.  This would be too little to utilize indie-go-go which has a minimum fundraising goal of $500.  Thankfully it also falls on a weekend where my ex-husband can't care for my children.  This means I will need to pay my neice $100 per night for 2 nights.  The remaining $50 will cover my transportation there and back.

If I don't reach my goal but raise a minimum of $250 I will register for the event and then work towards the remainder of the necessary funds on my own outside of indie-go-go.

If I don't reach my goal and am unable to register for the event I will use the money only for a similar workshop or writers group.

No funds will be used for personal uses not mentioned above.

WHAT YOU GET:

***** $500 = WINNER WINNER CHICKEN DINNER! ******

Thank You!  I hereby dub you "Uber Awesome Benefactor of Bea".

You get all of "Your Name in Lights" PLUS:  

A $25 Amazon Gift Card

You'll be the 2nd phone call made after I sign my 1st publishing contract. 

***** $250 = YOUR NAME IN LIGHTS! *****

Thank you!  You're amazing!  

You'll receive a personal phone call to discuss all of the happenings of the weekend, the book , the blog, or the topic of your choice on the day after my return.

You get a personal mention in the "Acknowledgments" portion of my first published novel.

You can choose 1 topic for me to address in "Former Suburban Mom" and have personal mention for said topic choice if you desire.

And last but not lease a signed copy of my first novel free within one week of it being publicly available!

***** $25+ = THANKYOUTHANKYOUTHANKYOU! *****

Thank you!  You will receive a signed copy of my first traditionally published novel free within one week of it becoming publicly available.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Every donation, whether it be $.25 or $250 is helpful in bringing "Blessed Bea" a step closer to being published.  Every donation will be received with humble gratitude that anyone would take a moment of their time and a dollar from their wallet to show belief in this work, and in me.

If you can not contribute a single cent there are other ways you can help!

1)  Share this campaign on your FaceBook page and ask your friends to help!  

2)  Read my blog - be it one post or all - and leave an honest comment as to how you FELT while reading it.  Even if it is "meh".  One of my favorite comments was from a reader who said I make her feel uncomfortable with my honesty, and that she likes it!  Better yet share it on your friends' walls (be sure to tag me so I know ;))

3)  Follow your own dream.  And tell me about it.  That is the best way you can contribute to my personal journey and aspirations.

Peace and Love,

Jayme

story:
Short Summary

The Author and The Work

Small town boy.                                        (Dorris, Chico)
Out in the Wide World.                   (San Francisco, Tokyo)
Looking to fund his addiction to

Energy drinks.
No, just kidding.
Trying to pay for
Routine dental work.  No,
Only fooling again.
Postgraduate degrees for his as yet
Young children.  (WINK).

THIS IS THE NEW STUFF.
HEAVILY INFLUENCED BY
CHARLES BUKOWSKI, ANNE SEXTON, EDNA ST. VINCENT

MILLAY, THE BARD, JAMES JOYCE, SALMAN RUSHDIE, WALLACE
STEPHENS, SIDDHARTHA, KOHELET, PHILIP TRAUM, W.B. YEATS
GEISEL, WALT WHITMAN, W.H. AUDEN, ROBERT BROWNING,

EE CUMMINGS, ROBERT BLY, ROBERT FROST,
LOKI, (NOTICE THAT HE'S OMITTED POUND, TROY, THE

UPANISHADS,
POUND,

POUND, OTHERS), SHEL SILVERSTEIN, THE TWO JOHNS,
ISAIAH TISHBY.

Why, after all, why?

This collection of poetry represents a new voice, which, albeit nasal, hoarse, and crackly, stands for peace, freedom, and ecstatic creativity.

What We Need

The funding has several key break points.  I can't afford to put the thing together at all if it doesn't hit five hundred.  An ISBN becomes possible at $2000.  An actual physical edition will cost around $5000, with a very limited print run to be signed and numbered.

Beyond this, the stretch goals are just for fun.  The final goal of $1,000,000 is based on an agreement I made with my wife a la those Facebook "if I get a million likes" shots.  She said we could have another baby if and only if...

What You Get

The corresponding contributions work out such that, if you kick in the minimum, you'll get the ebook version (unless you are my grandmother, in which case I will print you a copy myself and send it with pictures of the kids) with or without an official ISBN.

The perks-linked amounts are designed to give people a bit of flexibility to choose whether they'd like a bound copy (in the case that one comes out) or a date with the author or what.

IN the event that the main goal is not met, contributors will receive at least an ebook version of their choice and whatever the alternative perk is for the amount pledged in lieu of the bound / printed version.

The Impact

Personally, this is just my way to get a start publishing.  If it takes off and I'm able to make enough to make it worth the time, I'll do it again or possibly seek out a traditional publisher or agent.

According to the Neil Strauss interview, Rick James once said of his music and lyrics that "the stuff just comes out of me" ~ in a lot of ways that summarizes my own attitude to poetry: if I just turn my mind in that direction, it flows out.

Will it change the world?  Like the flutter of a butterfly's wings, if only a few nearby are moved then the effort will have been worth it.  More metaphysical than polemical, reaching past needy wheedling toward satire and a potentially comic interpretation of the underverse, borrowing more than was appropriate or just... If a firestorm of love is the result, then so be it.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute right now, but are inclined to support this project, please post the link to your social media status and tell anyone else you think might benefit from an ethereal smack upside the head.

story:
Hello, my name is Rimantas. I travel now. Today-from India, Dharmsala to United States, Nevada - Burning Man Caracansary 2014. 

I've chosen to dedicate this period of my life for getting more experience in different ways, I'm not working from 8 to 5 at the moment. I practice yoga every day and also I volunteer when I have opportunity - I like to contribute my energy. knowledge and love to do stuff and make nice things happen without any money rewards. Why? because that is a part of the experience.

 I've started my journey in Vilnius where I was living for the last decade. I decided to quit my office job and start something different. I felt I needed this. Changes in my life, in my space. I miss my friends but we will definitely meet again.
Today I'm always on the road. The path which leads to understanding of being.

I started at home went to Hawaii yoga festival then spent some time in India Ashraam and here I go again - to Burning Man. The place which people call Home. The huge unfriendly desert.

This time I'm more than just a visitor. I'm integral full part of it. I come to help to build the Black Rock City. The one that is temporary like mirage though it shows up each year every year.

After BRC will vanish my journey will come to the end of the circle. I will go back to Vilnius and bring my experience with me. The art of yoga, the know-how to work at the DPW  (Department of Public Works at Burning Man), the love, the passion to do good things and share it with everybody.

I need your little help to make this circle complete. And I will try to do my best to say thank you in that way I think you would like. 

Today I write my travel blog and share my experience and love from learning and receiving things. When I'll be back I'm going to continue sharing the things I've learned and gifting the love I have for the World and people,


Yours sincerely,

Rimas

story:
"Trump has significant business interests in Scotland. He has flaunted his Scots heritage to promote himself in Anglo-American culture. That is why he is coming to Turnberry as part of his campaign for President – to prove he is a world statesman, and to show that he wasn’t beaten here. It’s true that Trump courts controversy. But he wants his Scottish trip to be protest free. He wants to say ‘the Scots’ are big fans.

We used to say during the anti-Iraq war protests in 2003 that world popular opinion was the second super power. We need that super power to start showing its teeth in the face of a world in danger of spiralling towards bigotry when it needs solidarity, and individualism when it needs collective solutions. Trump is the symbol of a future we need to fight against. It would be a dereliction not to challenge him when he lands on our turf. And just as we challenge him, we will be standing with every American who is fighting back against a rigged system and the division and intolerance it breeds."

Read more: http://bellacaledonia.org.uk/2016/06/21/scotlan...
story_txt: "Trump has significant business interests in Scotland. He has flaunted his Scots heritage to promote himself in Anglo-American culture. That is why he is coming to Turnberry as part of his campaign for President – to prove he is a world statesman, and to show that he wasn’t beaten here. It’s true that Trump courts controversy. But he wants his Scottish trip to be protest free. He wants to say ‘the Scots’ are big fans.We used to say during the anti-Iraq war protests in 2003 that world popular opinion was the second super power. We need that super power to start showing its teeth in the face of a world in danger of spiralling towards bigotry when it needs solidarity, and individualism when it needs collective solutions. Trump is the symbol of a future we need to fight against. It would be a dereliction not to challenge him when he lands on our turf. And just as we challenge him, we will be standing with every American who is fighting back against a rigged system and the division and intolerance it breeds."Read more: http://bellacaledonia.org.uk/2016/06/21/scotlan...

story:
Short Summary

The Women in Horror Annual (WHA) is an anthology of horror fiction and nonficton written by women. There are plenty of horror anthologies out there, but few which are exclusively authored by female writers. 

The WHA is a celebration of female voices in horror, giving talented writers the opportunity to see their work published.  We believe there's a demand for female-authored horror that's not being met, and the WHA will help fill that void.

The works have been selected and edited. The next step is publication, and that's where you come in. With your assistance, the WHA will be made available in electronic and hard copy formats. With your assistance, these horror writers will find an audience.

The WHA is a labour of love, a passion project for our writers and editors. 

We started small with a humble call for submissions which attracted more attention than we could ever hope for, and now we're dreaming big! We can't wait to share the WHA with horror fans around the world.

What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for $5000 to cover printing and advertising costs. Selling a book can be tough, and the horror market is large.

Our primary goal is to get the WHA into the hands of readers, and to that end we need to market and advertise the book. Ad space in magazines and copies for reviewers cost money, so we're asking for help to pay the bills.

We're offering a number of donation levels, from $5 to $200, each with their own unique perks. We have branded USBs, limited edition prints, copies of the anthology, and other brag-worthy things available for contributors.

Any donation is greatly appreciated, and all monies (whether we reach our goal or not) will be put toward bringing this book to into the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help us in other ways? We welcome any kind of assistance you can provide. A Facebook post, a tweet, smoke signals, an announcement over the PA system in the subway, whatever you can do to help us reach more readers, we're grateful.

story:
Gritty Dark Addictive Romance

Temptation Never Tasted So Sweet

Amazon Kindle Author Debuts Her new ROMANCE NOVELLA

Local romance author J M Pozon has always dreamed of writing literature that not only excites the senses but stirs the soul. She has done just that with the novel Setting Fire to the Darkness.

The erotic novel will Debut June 19 2016 on Amazon Kindle fire. It is the first installment in the Love Bares No Color in The Garden of Eve Trilogy.

Set in Chicago Illinois, it is an interracial romance, a suspense-filled tale about a wealthy business man with a checkered past and ties to the Russian Mafia.

As he tries to escape the treachery of the world into which he was born, he falls for the beautiful Evangelina Reese. She is a woman struggling with her own haunted demons.

And loving Cameron Elliott is dangerous game, one that could land them both into the line of fire. Their love story is as dark and deadly as it is addictive.

This highly anticipated novel already leading the way in Amazon Pre-sales. And is Storming social media with over 10,000 Instagram followers and 5000 Facebook Fans.

It has been featured on multiple book blogs, Book reviews sites. As well as earning her several author spotlights, Magazine and radio Interviews.


“We were chaos in the mist of fire. Insanity without logic. Weightless density that defied the very laws of gravity. When I was with him my feet never touched the ground. He didn’t keep me grounded. He made me fly. Only problem was at some point I had to come down. And when I did I felt like I was falling without a parachute. "

story:
The Story of My Book

I Am Gold Dust (And You Are Too) contains stories and tools designed to help you show up as your whole-hearted, authentic self to your workplace — and your world.

My name is Stephanie VanZytveld and I am the author of I Am Gold Dust (And You Are Too). Despite following the prevailing wisdom about “how to be successful,” I found myself completely burnt out at the age of 31, with a life that looked great on paper, but in reality was a complete sham.

Over the past eight years, I’ve been on a journey to remain comfortable in my skin, regardless of the setting. This book explains the mental shifts and mindfulness practices that have helped others and myself navigate the messier parts of the workplace — and life — when conventional wisdom falls short.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover your own internal compass and learn how to follow your intuition — even when it means breaking from the pack. I’ll share various mindfulness practices and techniques have helped others and myself turn down the volume knob on the other voices in today’s hyper-connected world, clamoring for our attention. Ultimately, I wrote this book to talk frankly about how I apply mindfulness techniques to harness this power at work — and in the rest of my world. Even though it can be messy and uncomfortable, the rewards for living a whole-hearted life are worth it.

In this book, you'll learn mental shifts and mindfulness tools that help ordinary people navigate life according to the authentic, essential self that animates each of us. (I've dubbed mine Gold Dust.)

Included are sections on:

Following Your Bliss: Learn how one woman's desire to become a surfer led to a career as a surf coach

Taking the Road Less Traveled: Meet people who've moved across the country and across the globe

Speaking Truth to Power: Discover an artist whose photography is expanding the conversations that dismantle structural inequalities

 

Who Is This Book For?

If fear is holding you back, this book is for you. I Am Gold Dust (And You Are Too) is a non-fiction book that speaks to people who are disillusioned with the status quo and plagued by fears of failure or other people's opinions. This is for anyone looking for inspiration or how to practically apply mindfulness practices to connect with their authentic selves and navigate all areas of their lives using their inner compass.

 

The Book - I Am Gold Dust (And You Are Too)

The book is written in three Parts:

Part One, “Becoming Gold Dust,” contains the Introduction and first three chapters which explain how I used to approach life — setting a goal and reverse engineering success, stacking up all the dominoes so they would fall precisely where I wanted them to land. Following society’s maps and adhering to the tenants of #hustle culture eventually turned on me. Burnt out and no longer able to use alcohol to dull the pain, I was desperate to learn how to be comfortable in my own skin. After my first trip to Camp Grounded, a Digital Detox camp in northern California, I began my quest to live a more authentic life in the workplace.

Part Two, “Following the Cosmic Breadcrumbs,” contains Chapters Four through Six and explores the mental models that help people follow their inner compass concerning life’s larger decisions.

Part Three, “Finding Your Inner Compass,” contains Chapters Seven through Ten which describe in clear, practical terms how to use mindfulness practices to connect with your authentic self to move through the messier, human aspects of life using your head AND your heart.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this spring

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.



I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

 

About the Author

Stephanie VanZytveld, MHA is a Sr. Strategy Consultant at Health Care Service Corporation where she works to improve the quality and affordability of healthcare.

Despite a successful career as a hair dresser, Ms. VanZytveld couldn't afford health insurance. Determined to improve the healthcare system, she returned to college to finish her education. She graduated with high distinction from the University of Michigan with departmental honors in Women's Studies. She earned a Masters in Healthcare Administration from the University of Illinois at Chicago.

American ideals like individualism and self-determination helped her build a convincing facade, but eventually those mindsets turned against her. In June of 2011, she got divorced. Seven weeks later, she got sober.

Burnt out and unable to use alcohol to dull the pain, she was desperate to learn how to be comfortable in her own skin. She became willing to try all sorts of eye-roll inducing tactics during her quest to live a more authentic life.

This book is a collection of the mental shifts and mindfulness practices that have helped VanZytveld tap into her most authentic, Gold Dust self — regardless of her surroundings. Not only has she lived to tell about it, it’s helped her see and connect with the same inner light that illuminates each of us.

Corporate culture pretends to be too cool for school when it comes to squishy concepts like mindfulness and intuition, but that's just garden variety fear dressed in an expensive suit. VanZytveld has built a life learning to embrace the suck, but sustaining it requires we embrace the squish as well.

For more information you can connect with Stephanie at Stephanie@IAmGoldDust.com and on Instagram @Stephanie.VanZytveld

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, here are some other ways you can help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. (When you use #IAmGoldDust and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, we can help amplify your efforts!)
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

 

Best,

Gold Dust


A.K.A. Stephanie VanZytveld

story:
Story of My Book

Finding Lavender is a story about a sixteen-year-old girl discovering her forever home amongst new people which she never believed she would get along with. It is a story about family and togetherness.

My name is Lauren Morrone and I am the author of Finding Lavender. I wrote this book because I understand how hard it is to feel like an outcast. I understand how difficult it is to go through your teen years feeling like you don’t belong, and I want to gather people who also understand this in order to form a sense of togetherness and community.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that being different and having unique lives is okay—not only okay, but exceptional. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to become familiar with the intersections of finding your forever home, knowing that it is okay to ask for help, and the true meaning of family and community.

You will love this book if you’re a fan of YA contemporary books, looking for a relatable, representative high school story, or struggle with a sense of belonging.

Finding Lavender speaks to teenagers and young adults who want to grapple with belonging and community in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Finding Lavender inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • What defines a family?
  • How can I be more inclusive and understanding?
  • What is the importance of community and togetherness?
I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the importance of family will change us all for the better.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021

  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Lauren Morrone is a student at Arcadia University in Glenside, Pennsylvania. She is currently a sophomore, studying English with a concentration in creative writing. She hopes to pursue her dreams of becoming a bestselling author beginning with Finding Lavender and extending to future books.

She decided to write Finding Lavender because of her struggles while growing up with social anxiety and depression, which caused her to feel like an outsider. Because of these experiences, she felt that it was important to tell the story of someone with a unique perspective on the world instead of writing from the perspective of someone the world has already heard from.

Lauren enjoys reading fantasy novels, watching Netflix shows, photography, and spending time with her family. She has a shih-tzu named Gizmo and a cat named Primrose, both of which Lauren is constantly posting about on social media.

For more information, you can connect with Lauren Morrone at morronelaurens@gmail.com and at @lauren.samantha on Instagram.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #FindingLavender and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Lauren Morrone

I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #FindingLavender and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Lauren Morrone

story:
Short Summary

I'll keep this short and simple. 

  • I've been writing for about 10 years now and this is the first book I ever wrote. It is not complete, though, and at the moment I can't afford to pay a professional editor to finish it. 
  • The book is incredibly important to me. It is important to me as an accomplishment and as an encapsulation of my mental and emotional state when I was in my early 20's. I want to share it with people in a professionally edited form. 
  • Recently I've gotten that I do not share what I create enough and since I realized that I have been sharing constantly. The thoughts of disappointing people are still there, however I am not at the effect of those thoughts anymore. Releasing this book in a complete state is an expression of what I'm committed everyone to get in touch with. That people get they matter, their lives are miracles and they make a difference. 

What We Need & What You Get

I need $1000 to pay a professional editor to complete editing my book. I have the editor and he has been generous enough to edit 2 chapters, however it doesn't work to continue without paying him. 

  • All funds are going to the editor. 
  • You will be verbally acknowledged for what a contribution you are, I will call you to acknowledge you. For the higher donors you will get a book and an acknowledgment. 
  • If I don't reach my goal, all funds will still go to the editor. 

The Impact

You are contributing to the hard work the editor will put into the book. You are contributing to my self-expression as a writer. And even if you don't fund this project, you are giving this request your time. And that in itself is a miracle, because I've never made a request like this before.

Risks & Challenges

I have a plan to complete editing the book in partnership with the editor by Halloween. There are risks and challenges in publishing and having a completely edited novel highly raises my chances of being published. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Ask me how the editing is going :) Ask me what the book is about. Ask a friend of yours what they're working on. Ask a stranger what matters to them. Ask yourself what have you been wanting to do for a while and what's stopping you, then do that thing. And then tell me what you discovered out of just asking.

story:
FISHERMAN’S BLUES (Riverhead Books, 2017) will be a sea shanty: a book of magical nonfiction chronicling the life of a community of Senegalese artisanal fishermen during a fishing season off the West African coast. 

FISHERMAN'S BLUES will be a lyrical, timely and timeless account of life on the shifting frontier between earth and sea, between the ancient and the modern: the haul and cast of being human. It will tell the greater story of an ocean and a culture affected by the Anthropocene, advancing a sense of wonderment that is essential to our sincere involvement in our planet. 

I am inviting you to join me on this new voyage.

My work focuses on exposing iniquities through high art. I embed myself with the cultures I describe. To research FISHERMAN'S BLUES--my sixth book of literary nonfiction--I moved from the United States to Joal, Senegal's largest artisanal fishing port. Since September 2015 I have been living in a fisherman's house, going to sea for up to 22 hours a day, building and bailing pirogues, hauling and picking net with fishermen whose catch may have ended up on your dinner plates.

Such research is expensive: I must pay for transportation, translators, guides, lodging. Then come the long solitary months of writing. My work on my latest book, WALKING WITH ABEL (Riverhead Books, 2015), which followed a family of nomadic Fulani cowboys in the Malian Sahel over the course of a year, was partially funded through Indiegogo. Some of you may have supported that work. I am profoundly grateful.

How you can help:

No amount is too small. In addition to donations, I ask you to spread the word about the book. Facebook, Twitter, email, messages in bottles--all helps.

What you get:

The Wolof fishermen say: Nio far--we're all in it together. Regardless of the size of your donation I will thank each contributor individually. Perks include authographed copies of the book when it is published, authographed limited edition prints of my drawings (I illustrate my own books), signed postcards from Senegal, and more. 

Welcome aboard--and dieureu dieuf from Joal, Senegal!

story:
We’re an eclectic bunch of story lovers, and we’re launching a new writing contest.

Short story writers will be invited to submit previously unpublished stories to The Lascaux Review, from which the journal’s editors will select a winner and nineteen additional finalists. The winner will receive $1000 and publication in the Review. Both winner and finalists will earn the privilege of displaying a virtual medallion on blogs and websites:

And all twenty stories will appear in an anthology:

We estimate we’ll need $5000 to run this contest and publish the anthology. The money will cover the prize, operating expenses, production costs, and marketing. We’re unpaid volunteers; every donation we’ve ever received to support the Review has been paid to writers or been used to help defray expenses.

What will we do if we don’t raise enough money? We’ll charge a modest entry fee, and fund the balance out of our own pockets. That’s what we’ve done for two previous (flash fiction) contests; see www.lascauxflash.com.

What will we do if we raise more than we need? We’ll put it toward the next prize, one for poetry. (Hopefully posing the question hasn’t jinxed us.)

Thank you for your assistance!

Perks

All contributors will have their names carved on the wall of our cave (a page devoted to donors). It will look something like this:

Here’s what the bookmark looks like (front and back):

And the soap rocks. These are 5.5” by 4” by 2.5” (about the size of a fist) and weigh 6 oz. Your choice of gem species. Since they’re hand-crafted, what you receive will vary slightly from the illustrations:

A facsimilie of the first page (Genesis) of Gutenberg’s Bible, using the same printing techniques Gutenberg himself employed. 45 by 32 cm (about 18” by 12”). Handmade linen paper. 24 karat gold leaf. Shipped from the Gutenberg Museum in Mainz, Germany. The illustration doesn’t do justice to the beauty of the facsimilie:

Please pass the word along, not only about our fundraiser but about the contest as well. As soon as submissions open we’ll post a link at The Lascaux Review.

www.lascauxreview.com

story:
Thank you so much!! 

We have reached our goal... and BEYOND! Thank you for believing, supporting and being part of our project. We hope that this book and practice brings light to your path.

Few people have expressed the desire to continue supporting (using the perks offered on this campaign). We want to extend this for some time. So if you want to get any of these perks, please contact us directly at info@skillsforawakening.com. Thank you!

Ramgiri and The HeartSourcing Yoga Team

_________________________________________________________________________

HeartSourcing: Finding Our Way To Love and Liberation

Ramgiri is a spiritual teacher and the creator of HeartSourcing. HeartSourcing is an integral practice that combines today's most effective methods for inner peace, emotional harmony and Self-realization, and opening the heart of love.

The book HeartSourcing: Finding Our Way To Love and Liberation is a simple and direct path to unconditional love. You will find within its pages clear instructions to dissolve fear and suffering through practical means: stillness, cultivating self-love and devotion, releasing emotions, and clearing the mind.

Ramgiri’s (born Andreas Braun) spellbinding journey from the aftermath of the Holocaust in Germany to the legendary Indian sage Neem Karoli Baba, Maharajji, to the Concentration camp of Auschwitz and into the depth of the heart is the ultimate adventure, which we all take in our own way. His message is nothing less than the liberation from all fear and pain into Self-realization. HeartSourcing takes us to the Source of that one supreme remedy - to live out of the inexhaustible core of the Heart.

No matter how dark the valley you may find yourself in, HeartSourcing offers a path back up into the light.

"Ramgiri is devoted to love, to what works, to peace and all the people on this earth." 

- Byron Katie, best-selling author of Loving What Is

"HeartSourcing is the direct way to all the unconditional love within you. It is the discovery of the soul’s potential to nurture itself and all others around it. Ramgiri is a pure vehicle in the transmission of this essential yoga of the Heart. Pure Love is a gift that can change the world!"

- Ram Dass, author of Be Here Now and Be Love Now

"As a holocaust survivor, I am touched that Ramgiri shows us in his Auschwitz experience that love can be found even in the greatest darkness. To embrace that love is freedom itself. Ramgiri gives us the wisdom and courage to make this great journey into the heart."

- Rabbi Zalman Schachter-Shalomi, author of Jewish with Feeling.


Join us today and start this revolution of love in your world!

Let this love spread from you into your world, for it is the only way humanity can sustain itself. 

_________________________________________________________________________

What We Need & What You Get

Stretch Goal: $15,000

This additional money helps to cover the costs of:

  • print file formatting, 
  • print book distribution, and 
  • print book cover design.

Thank you again for bringing a revolution of Love into the world. Please invite your loved ones to join us today.

This is a labor of love and we are going to publish this book come what may! How could we not? The great secret of the Heart can no longer remain secret, it’s just too important for us all! It’s crucial for our happiness, our survival and our awakening. True revolutionaries aren’t wimps. Are you with us? And yes, we can’t do it alone. Love is about connection. About creating and nurturing a tribe. About helping each other in ways that really count. So help us give the book the audience it deserves. That starts with you (like love) and spreads from you into your world.

So the most important thing you get from us is what you will be able to give yourself, once you read HeartSourcing: the love, the clarity of mind, the peace and inner harmony you deserve (because it’s your true nature).

You help us publish the book, which gives you the know-how and the wisdom to find love and truth where it can be found: in the Source of your Heart.

And have I mentioned that the No-Brainer option is your best bet?


Here is what we offer in return:

  • Check out the NO-BRAINER package: 8 copies of HeartSourcing PLUS our CD and instantly become a source of blessings for your friends. To give the gift of love is the best gift you can give.
  • The eBook version of HeartSourcing
  • The Paperback version 
  • The Paperback version PLUS our recently released CD "Living with an Open Heart - guided HeartSourcing meditations by Ramgiri and music by Krishna Das
  • Two amazing BONUSES by our friends Ram Dass and Krishna Das
  • and to all of our pledgers, a personal thank-you email for being part of this project and starting with us this Revolution of Love!!
  • In addition to the book HeartSourcing, Ramgiri is offering private mentoring sessions worldwide, and an in-depth 3-Month Mentoring Program. "The impulse for enlightenment has been transmitted for thousands of years in the intimate connection of teacher and student as spiritual friends."   It is the most transformative experience we know. This is for you if you want to create a decisive shift in your quality of life and your spiritual awakening. Learn the priceless skills that free your mind of stress and your life of conflict. Here is the Mentoring with Ramgiri page for more information.

Our campaign closes on Friday, June 20th. Thank you for pledging today.

_________________________________________________________________________

Learn More

• Please enjoy the HeartSourcing meditations and Satsangs on our YouTube channel

• And visit our featured articles on Elephant Journal, dedicated to bring HeartSourcing teachings to the world. To read them all, enter in the search box Ram Giri or Ramgiri. 

• Among many ways to experience Ramgiri's teachings, we offer a FREE Initiation into HeartSourcing! A series of ten (10) guided meditations by Ramgiri in audio format. They will come to your inbox for ten consecutive days, and they are yours for life.

_________________________________________________________________________

Your Impact

Why do we need a Revolution of Love?

Our Reality:

We hurt ourselves and each other in countless ways. We fight ever more damaging wars. We are destroying nature. We are depleting the natural resources of our planet. We are in slavery to the attachments and revulsions of the mind.

 - How are we going to survive, unless we open the heart?

Our Possibility:

We have the capacity for complete clarity. Immense love and compassion and absolute fearlessness are our true, inner nature. 

-  How will we realize that, unless we open the heart?

With HeartSourcing we can learn to live in a constant state of wholeness and love. This is the most potent medicine known to humankind. This is how we can become the change we want to see in the world!

“Separation is an illusion.  Oneness is our birthright, and the way to claim is effortless: drop into the heart, again and again.” 
– Mirabai Starr

_________________________________________________________________________

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone is in a position to pledge towards our HeartSourcing campaign. But please feel free to join our family in other ways:

  • Join our Google+ circle
  • Subscribe to our YouTube channel
  • Join us on Facebook
  • Share http://igg.me/at/heartsourcing with your loved ones

And wish us well on our journey as we wish you well on yours.


Our campaign closes on Friday, June 20th. Thank you for pledging today!


Ramgiri

and The HeartSourcing Yoga Family

story:
Short Summary

Greetings Everyone:

My name is ShaQuenna Lane-Arrington, mother of four, grandmother of one and I'm a full time student majoring in Psychology. The time has come for me to ask for your help to get my book- A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl published in hardback copies that Empowers the Youth in many Positive Ways. My plans include traveling across the world to speak to the Youth at Schools, Prisons and Boys and Girls Clubs...

 I need your Help to make this Possible.........

 We Can Make A Difference

 I'm the author of a Christian Fiction Book Titled-A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl, that I stepped out on pennys and dimes to get Self-Published in March 2012. I really need your monetary support to continue my effort in reaching out to the youth across the nation. I'm planning to go on my first book tour in March of 2013. In the mean-time I need financial help to distribute my book to schools across the nation. My book A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl is a book to outreach to all genders but especially tween and teen girls. My goal is to outreach across and beyond the United States to empower the younger generation. There's so many youth crying out for help and with-in this reading alot of answers can be found to lift up and bring restoration to the lives of the youth. In this reading I discuss issues that many parents may not fill comfortable opening up with-in their youth, such as Purity, Self-Esteem Issues, Stop Bullying  and HIV Awareness and so much more.

 What We Need & What You Will Receive

By supporting this fundraiser/pre-order you will essentially:

        1. Support the Vision

        2. Help A Youth Stay on the Right Track

        3. Perk Donations Extras 

        4. All Perk Donations will have the opportunity to have their name or organization listed inside of the Hardback copy of the book....

        5. All Perk Donations will get a copy of the Published- Hardback Book Free with Donations of 25.00 or more....  A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl

 

We have set a target of 5,000 dollars to get this book Printed and Published in Hardback Copy and my Goal is to continue distributing my Paperback copies to Schools and Youth Programs Nationwide.

My  Vision and Effort is to continue to reach out to the youth generation by publishing additional books for the youth, speaking at various youth programs and delivering copies of A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl to schools across the nation.

Any amount can help and will be truely appreciated to help this mission.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you know someone who might like this book? Please let them know!

 I know firsthand that some people just can’t contribute monetary donations at this time, however you may know somebody who can contribute. Please share my goal with family and friends and help me reach my goal. The Youth is lacking for knowledge and understanding all across the nation. 

 Please Help me, Help A Youth to stay on the Right Path.

 I'm the author of a Christian Fiction Book Titled-A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl, that I stepped out on pennys and dimes to get Self-Published in March 2012. I really need your monetary support to continue my effort in reaching out to the youth across the nation. I'm planning to go on my first book tour in March of 2013. In the mean-time I need financial help to distribute my book to schools across the nation. My book A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl is a book to outreach to all genders but especially tween and teen girls. My goal is to outreach across and beyond the United States to empower the younger generation. There's so many youth crying out for help and with-in this reading alot of answers can be found to lift up and bring restoration to the lives of the youth. In this reading I discuss issues that many parents may not fill comfortable opening up with-in their youth, such as Purity, Self-Esteem Issues, Stop Bullying  and HIV Awareness and so much more.
 What We Need & What You Will Receive
By supporting this fundraiser/pre-order you will essentially:
        1. Support the Vision
        2. Help A Youth Stay on the Right Track
        3. Perk Donations Extras 
        4. All Perk Donations will have the opportunity to have their name or organization listed inside of the Hardback copy of the book....
        5. All Perk Donations will get a copy of the Published- Hardback Book Free with Donations of 25.00 or more....  A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl
 
We have set a target of 5,000 dollars to get this book Printed and Published in Hardback Copy and my Goal is to continue distributing my Paperback copies to Schools and Youth Programs Nationwide.
My  Vision and Effort is to continue to reach out to the youth generation by publishing additional books for the youth, speaking at various youth programs and delivering copies of A Proverbs Thirty-One Girl to schools across the nation.
Any amount can help and will be truely appreciated to help this mission.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Do you know someone who might like this book? Please let them know!
 I know firsthand that some people just can’t contribute monetary donations at this time, however you may know somebody who can contribute. Please share my goal with family and friends and help me reach my goal. The Youth is lacking for knowledge and understanding all across the nation. 
 Please Help me, Help A Youth to stay on the Right Path.
