story:
Update April 26th. With only 7 days to go, you can now get a piece of our historic basement. According to the monument protection agency, our basement appears to be a formet pit house (pre-medieval). In the layers of clay on the floor we found shards of various age - originating from 15th through 18th century. THE FIRST THREE people on each of the next 7 days, who donate a minimum of $20 will get three shards per mail (please leave your adress!). Check the galery for a picture!

 

What's this about?

You love reading mysteries & thrillers set in Victorian London? You find kick-butt heroines rather magnetic? You have an insatiable craving for Sherlock Holmes? Welcome to the Kronberg Crimes series!

The first book, The Devil’s Grin, was published independently in September 2012 and did surprisingly well on the US market (Amazon’s #1 British Detective Mystery and #1 Historical Fiction in Febr/Mar2013. And nope, that didn’t result in riches).

Now, the second book in the series, The Fall, is finished and aching to see a top notch editor. You can read the first two chapters here.

 

Why help fund this project?

I believe that a book gets better when readers can take part in the creative process of storytelling.

The Devil’s Grin’s newest edition heeds readers’ advice and critique received on Amazon and Goodreads, on book blogs and Sherlock Holmes fan-pages.

To write an authentic Sherlock Holmes is not an easy undertaking. All books in this series are/will be beta-read by hard-core Sherlock Holmes fans to make sure Holmes truly remained Holmes.

Fellow authors and professional editors help to tighten the prose and sharpen the plot. At the end, you'll get a story that glues you to the book's pages (or e-reader's screen).

And here comes the cherry for your cream cake: YOU can take part in creating the third in the Kronberg Crimes series!

You think you live in the wrong century? You miss the smell of eel-pie and horse manure when walking through London? Well, maybe then it’s time to share your thoughts with us on Facebook. We think that Holmes’s disappearance after the Reichenbach Falls must have been more than simply “going into hiding”. A man like Holmes wouldn’t just run away, would he?

The third in the Kronberg Crimes series will cover this period. A plot is laid out, but far from being completed. Take part in the creative process! Share your ideas and vote on other people’s thoughts on our Facebook Page.

 

If you’d like your name to be used for a character in The Fall, you have to be aware that this is a thriller/mystery series. You most likely end up as some creep. The more important your character is, the more expensive he/she is. You will also get a subscription to all Kronberg Crimes e-books in the series, a signed paperback and your name on our thank you list on the Kronberg Crimes website and in the acknowledgements of The Fall.

 

What we need:

$3500 US Developmental editing to force you one the edge of your seat and make you gnaw off your fingernails. This editor has previously worked on several NY Times Bestselling novels!

$500 US Line & copy editing and killing any non-Holmesian slips, done by Carrie from the The Stormy Petrels

 

What we do, should we not reach our goal of $4000 US:

This is a low risk project. The manuscript is written and I do all my cover art, book trailers, type-setting, and e-book formatting myself. Should the required budget not be reached, I'll have to get a cheaper editor. The less I'll be able to pay, the lower the quality of editing services (on avarage).

 

You don't have money but you'd still like to help?

How lovely! Please share this page and The Devil's Grin Facebook page. Thank you so much!

story:
The essentials of my raw, honest contemplative photography...

13 years ago life hit me with a triple sledgehammer: Divorce, Career Burnout and an Explosion of Intuitive Abilities. It took me on this solo journey to gather the images in my book and finally let my words out…I experienced myself on two levels - the mind reeling in agony and my Wise Self determined to soar free of fear. I speak of these with raw honesty in my contemplative photography book - The Wise Self Within.

I made extreme sacrifices to live a very simple lifestyle so I could write this book. I sold my house and everything I owned - I needed time alone in nature to heal and to reconnect to myself in a deeper way. I wanted to become the person that would write this book. At times, it was a very lonely path. Frankly, I was a mess and this book had to be completed…so I could be completed as well. I had no idea the ride I was about to go on...

Read a reflection and see a photo at http://www.areconnectedlife.com/reflection-sample-from-the-wise-self-within-bottled-up/

I want to let others know they aren't alone. I want to inspire others to see life in a new light. I share my sloppy walk through life - so as to inspire others to also walk the path home to healing. The photos evoke emotion, the reflections even can make you chuckle at this thing we call "Life" - each reflection ends with a Reconnection Tip that I use each day to remain connected to my center of stillness within - The Wise Self. It is my sincere wish that my book helps the world in some small way.

Get to know me a bit at www.AReconnectedLife.com and see the work I have been doing to prepare myself to complete this book! View testimonials too... 

Empower me to birth this manuscript into a bound book with gorgers color photos!!!  So I may continue to inspire and empower others through my work.

Thank you for being my mid-wife to my Soul.


What I hope for - What I have for you...

I hope to raise $3000.00 to self publish my book.

All money is used for self publishing. Every dime. Which includes:

Design and Layout (Complex Interior Service due to Photographs)

Professional Editing 

Cover Design

Kirkus Indie Review of my Book (so as to give it a fighting chance!)

Kindle Formatting

ISBN 

If I am gifted with more than my asking amount I plan to buy an LCD projector and go on tour in my car!  I want to share my photos and reflections with the world - anyone who will listen!  I have some events in the working and plan to continue to make contact. So any extra funds above the $3000 I am hoping for will go to very good use in presentations and some technology to share my reflections with others…and help them laugh along the way!

If I don't meet my goal the money that is contributed will still go to fund the publishing of the book. For example if my contributions accrued are only $679 then I will start phase one of the book until I personally can raise the next set of funding. 

This manuscript will not lay dormant for the rest of its life…I am determined to birth this elephant!


What I have for you...

Smiles Galore - $5 contribution you will be publicly thanked on my professional Facebook page. 

Big Hug - $10 contribution you will receive a digital photograph with an inspirational message and thanked publicly on my professional Facebook page.

High Five - $25 contribution you will receive a copy of The Wise Self Within, a digital photo from the book with message and a big thank you on my professional Facebook page.

Jumping Jacks - $50 contribution you will receive a copy of The Wise Self Within and a Q/A phone session ask whatever you wish I will share all I can in an hour to assist you.

Cartwheels - $100 contribution you will receive a copy of The Wise Self Within and a one hour Reiki Energy Medicine session to relieve stress, anxiety, instill peace and rest  / renewal! 

Headstands - $300 contribution you will receive a copy of The Wise Self Within, a photograph in the book dedicated to you and a one hour Reiki Energy Medicine session to relieve stress, anxiety, instill peace and deep rest / renewal.


The Impact

There are so many people lost and in pain. In total agony as their minds create such misery in their lives and they may not even know it. 

The Wise Self Within offers a raw, compassionate and inspiring look at my approach to this process of breaking free of the mind. It is lighthearted and real…easy to understand  through my life stories. I feel it will reach the masses that are way over the "spiritual" movement of any kind - as my book brings you back home to yourself.

It not only inspires, it empowers the reader with gentle tips for them to reconnect to their own wisdom. The photographs and light hearted reflections assist to breakdown challenging "spiritual concepts" into everyday language we all can easily digest in a short read. 

This book and sharing my insights on self leadership and self love is my new mission….

I have been published several times in WNC Woman Magazine - see the latest article at  http://www.wncwoman.com/2013/12/01/reconnecting-to-faith/ - which is in the book in a shortened version.

I won a District Level Humorous Speech Contest at Toastmasters in 2011 and went on to the State Competition!

I have been speaking at various venues since 2011 and teaching workshops on self leadership, self care and the power of compassionate communication.  View my website for some videos of me speaking - http://www.areconnectedlife.com/manage-your-hustle-n-bustle-with-a-reconnection-tool/

I am dedicated to sharing my insights and empowering the world to reconnect to their Wise Self Within.

Help me grow my network…

Get my free e-book "5 Reconnection Tips" on my website at www.AReconnectedLife.com and sign up for my video newsletter.

Even if you choose not to contribute - if you feel connected to me in some way - reach out and say hello to me via email!  Tina@AReconnectedLIfe.com and please….tell at least one person about my campaign!  Together let's birth the whole world out from beneath the chatter to reconnect Home to their Wise Self Within. 

Don't forget to use the share tools for Facebook etc….You can find me on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TinaFireWolf

Thank You - Thank You - Thank You !!!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Denise Calhoun and I have written a handbook of activities for the elderly. My concern for the elderly stems from having been the primary caregiver of my mom for three years.  After observing her and other older family members as well as elderly residents in various homes, it became apparent that the quality of communication they were exposed to, not only affected their cognitive ability, but their emotional state of mind as well.

As an educator for over thirty years, I became interested in the similarities between young children and the elderly.  Through extensive research on the aging, while working on my master's degree, I noted the many symptoms that revealed characteristics of early childhood development.  In view of this awareness, my goal is to incorporate what I know about teaching children and applying it to helping the aging.

One of the key elements I found to sustaining quality of life was effective communication.  Handbook of Activities for the Elderly, therefore, was developed to stimulate minds and foster healthy development, mentally, physically, and emotionally.

The handbook includes activities in four domains of learning: physical environment, socio-emotional, nutrition/fitness, and language/cognition.  The primary purpose of this guide is to provide step-by-step directions for quick and easy hands-on activities to build strong communication skills.

This handbook will not solve all of the problems facing the elderly, but hopefully it will be a noteworthy attempt to contribute to the solution.  Through positive suggestions of Handbook of Activities for the Elderly, my dream is to make the world aware of how powerful meaningful communication is to sustaining quality of life for our elderly population.

 

How Can You Help?

First of all and foremost, spread the word on valuing the wisdom and respect of our elders.  Please do not let old age become a meaningless role. If we do not change our way of thinking, we are throwing our future away.

Your donations will, therefore, help with promotional costs in spreading the word on how important meaningful activities, interaction, and communication are to sustaining quality of life for the aging.  Spreading the word would involve funding informational workshops and/or seminars on communication.

Donations will also help with publishing and marketing costs.  In order to get the message across it is important to donate copies of Handbook of Activties for the Elderly to assisted living and nursing homes throughout our nation.

Besides helping to get the book out to the general public, your donations will help with the cost of on-going research and development of new materials to guide and enlighten family members, staff, administrators, and policy makers on how to keep the elderly included in our society.

 

A Special Thank You Message

For anyone who shares the mission of making a change in the way our seniors are treated, a big warm heartfelt thank you goes out to you.  My goal is to build a bridge and make a connection to the aging that will not be broken.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just get the word out and talk about the goals of this campaign. This can be accomplished by using the tools on this site to share with others.

story:
Teaching About Africa one country at a time. Join the movement and spread the word.

My Story

Lesedi Books is a series of children’s picture books focusing on the positive aspect of growing up in Africa. This campaign is for the first two books in the series: My Village and Lesedi's Favorite Game. I've written the books and I have an illustrator from South Africa working on the illustrations.


The books follow Lesedi, a ten-year old girl who lives in a rural village in Botswana. Like Lesedi, I was born and raised in a small village in Botswana. Each book covers a specific topic about living in the village as seen though the eyes of Lesedi. The books are geared towards children between 7 - 12 years old.


The Impact

 A couple questions I am frequently asked since I moved from Botswana are, “Did you see lions and elephants everyday?” and “Did you live in the jungle?”  Most children’s view of Africa is limited to what they see in the media and movies such as The Lion King. The media typically depict African children as dirty, sick and hungry. There are hardly any images of African children who live a normal life in the cities, towns and villages.


Stories are one of the most powerful ways to learn about another culture. My goal is to publish picture books that show children in normal day-to-day African life situations. I hope the picture books will help children broaden their images and understanding of Africa and to help them see African children in a different way.


Where I am At

I plan to publish these books through Village Life books which I founded in 2010 and based in Winnipeg, Canada. I published and released my first picture book, THE LION'S DECEIT (ISBN:  978-0-9867460-0-0), in May 2011 through Village Life Books. The Lion's Deceit reached #2 on the McNally Robinson Booksellers bestseller's list based on the sales for the week of September 25, 2011. I have also received author invitations to speak at schools.


My long term goal is to publish ten picture books in the Lesedi Books following the main character, Lesedi, on her adventures in Mosetse village. I have completed five manuscripts in the series and the illustrator has also started sketching out illustrations for the first two books.


Where The Money Goes

I will continue with this project whether my funding goals are met or not, but your support will get me off the ground. The book production costs are very high and your participation will help with the production of the first print run for My Village and Lesedi's Favorite Game books, including:
  • Completing the illustrations for the two books
  • Editing
  • Book printing
  • Promotional website
  • Marketing the books


Other Ways You Can Help

Share this project with your friends and anyone who might be interested.

 

You can follow us on Facebook and Twitter (@VillageLifeBook) where we'll be posting updates on our progress.

another culture. My goal is to publish picture books that show
children in normal day-to-day African life situations. I hope the picture books will
help children broaden their images and understanding of Africa
and to help them see African children in a different way.
Where I am At
I plan to publish these books through Village Life books which I founded in 2010 and based in Winnipeg, Canada. I published and released my first picture book, THE LION'S DECEIT (ISBN:  978-0-9867460-0-0), in May 2011 through Village Life Books. The Lion's Deceit reached #2 on the McNally Robinson Booksellers bestseller's list based on the sales for the week of September 25, 2011. I have also received author invitations to speak at schools.

My long term goal is to publish ten picture books in the Lesedi Books following the
main character, Lesedi, on her adventures in Mosetse village. I have
completed five manuscripts in the series and the illustrator has also started sketching out illustrations
for the first two books.


Where The Money Goes

I will continue with this project whether my funding goals are met or not, but your support will get me off the ground. The book production costs are very high and your participation will help with the production of the first
print run for My Village and Lesedi's Favorite Game books, including:

Completing the illustrations for the two books
Editing


Book printing


Promotional website 



Marketing the books


Other Ways You Can Help


Share this project with your friends and anyone who might be
interested.
 
You can follow us on Facebook
and Twitter (@VillageLifeBook)
where we'll be posting updates on our progress.

story:
CLICK HERE TO READ AN EXCEPT OF THIS OVER-THE-TOP AMAZING READ...

This is a campaign to fund the publication of my completed manuscript "I Am The Swallow," which has recently been accepted by Iguana Books, an new and innovative Canadian independent publisher.

I Am The Swallow is a memoir of the life changing year I spent in Australia interlaced with stories from my fabulously off-the-wall mennonite childhood. This book is about travel, falling in and out of love, change and adaptation, and having the guts to grab life by the balls and steer your own course. 

This story also came out of my recovery from a nagging mental illness, and is completely fearless and honest. Those of you who who long for liberation, who lust after airplanes and camper vans, who crave core-shaking life changes: I dedicate this story to you.

"Hot damn! I'd love to read an excerpt." Click the link, silly.

What do I need all this dough for? So I can vacation in Mexico for six months, obviously.  No kidding, book publishing is not free. I'm dedicated to bringing only the finest quality book to market. The finished product must be indistinguishable from anything published at Random House.  Anything to keep my book from looking like this will be money well spent.

Here's what we need to do to get it there:

  • Structural Edit. Because let's face it, all books need one of these.
  • Proofreading. Because what's sexier than good grammar?
  • Marketing. Because we plan to sell a zillion copies.
  • Cover Design. Because homemade covers are worse than day old bread.
  • Formatting. Because I would rather clean toilets in North Queensland for another four months than have to format that sucker myself.

Check out the sexy perks you get in return for your sexy contribution.  It's more than a virtual high-five, I promise. 

            Tah-Dah!! The Cover. So you see, it is a real book!

                            

"Yeah, so...what's the point"

The point, compadre, is to inspire others to break free. If this book inspires just one student to drop out of law school and start a band, one young woman to dump her boyfriend and stop dieting, or one other person, any person, to throw caution to the wind and start living the life he always dreamed of, it will be a great success.

As you may have guessed, the point is also to make some cash. I love to inspire, but I also love to cash cheques and buy expensive dresses. My publisher does too.

"I'm broke, yo! But I'd like to help you"

Make some noise, baby. Share this campaign with your friends. Tell them how awesome it is to break free and create the life you always wanted. Tell them you know someone who did it. 

Indiegogo has some sweet sharing tools you can use. Give the campaign a shoutout on Facebook. DM your mates on Twitter.  Email your homies with a link.

story:
Short Summary

I'm 25 year old author Michael Karner, this is my fifth novel besides several short stories. This campaign is about you and me materializing the project "Red Axe, Black Sun" via e-book as a high quality fantasy novel available on amazon, Barnes & Noble's, Kobo etc. by autumn 2013.  

Backing this project will contribute to the publication of a fantasy book that is full of fast-paced action, deep male and female characters and a setting that avoids known clichés in a realistic, gripping way.

Synopsis:

Axe-fighter Dryston of Decia helps his ex-lover and sorceress Kyra Celeste in rescueing a girl with a death-list tattoo. Getting poisoned during the action, he has to track down a gangland-boss whose name is on the list to claim the antidote. But with time running out, Dryston and Kyra are drawn into a bloody campaign by King Tancred, who is driven by a long-feared event that is more severe than his own downfall.

What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down:

Cover art as seen in the picture above created by professional digital artist - 400$

Name and title font for cover designed by professional graphic designer - 200$

Hiring professional editor for grammar, punctuation, prose, plot - approximately 700$

Register publishing company, register ISBN number - approximately 100$

(not counted: website, advertisement)                                in total - 1400$

What You Get:

Be the first to pre-order the fantasy novel "Red Axe, Black Sun" and receive the book in whose publication you contributed.

I give you a thrilling story taking you into a dark and simplistic world. A tale of unhappy love, where characters get broken and have to learn to get up again, a fight for survival and a choice to trade one soul against another. Bravery and corruption in a war that is not against evil.  This is where all bets are off and heroes begin to suffer and die. Their sacrifices will decide whose axes will turn red and if the day of the black sun will come.

All you need to do is select a perk now!

In case we cannot reach this goal together, the funds will still go into the above mentioned purchases. This is my passion and nothing is going to stop me from it.

In case the project meets great response, additional perks would be possible, with the goal to unlock print version.

The Impact

Your contribution will directly improve the quality of the book. Each cent will go into the fine-tuning and guarantee a top-notch novel from which you as a supporter and customer directly benefit, as well as the huge fantasy community around the world to which you make it possible to still their relentless hunger for new books and be entertained.  

For me, the impact of your contribution will be tremendous. You will show me that you support my work and will ensure that I can spend more time and money on next novels. You see where this is going. You are about to support a career and guarantee a number of books I will put my heart's blood into, each besting the last.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign! Word-of-mouth recommendation is the most powerful tool in marketing!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools for this or tell your friends and fantasy fans!

Ladies, gentlemen - Let's do this!

story:
Brief Campaign Summary

Hi. I’m Dr. Jason Nicholas, otherwise known as “The Preventive Vet”. I’m a veterinarian on a mission to empower all cat and dog owners with the information, resources, and advice necessary to keep cats and dogs healthy, safe, and out of the emergency room.  [* You can learn more about me and how I’m helping pets and their people by checking out my website at www.ThePreventiveVet.com.]

I’m looking to expand my pet safety message beyond the internet and social media realms to the publishing world with two eye-opening, fun to read, and easy-to-digest pet safety tip books that I’ve just finished writing – one for cat owners, and one for dog owners – but I need your help to do so.

The books are already written and WILL BE PUBLISHED regardless of the outcome of this campaign, I'm just hoping to raise (at least) $15,000 to help cover the costs of producing them (you can see the breakdown of where the money will be going further down in the campaign description). So I’m turning to my strongest supporters, and indeed all pet lovers, to ask for contributions and help in spreading the word about these books. In exchange for your support, I’m offering great deals on the books, cool commemorative gear, and unique opportunities to honor and/or memorialize your pets.

 

 

These books will be great for pet owners of any experience level, and will especially make great gifts for any friends or family new to pet ownership. Your contribution and word-of-mouth will help me get these important books off my computer, into production, and into the hands of cat and dog lovers the world over. Thank you in advance for being a part of this wonderful movement that will help protect the health and safety of all cats and dogs – including yours!

Be Aware. Be Prepared. Be Preventive!

Dr. Jason

*Please continue reading below for more information about pet safety and my books, including sample pages. Video testimonials for me and The Preventive Vet can be seen by clicking the "Gallery" tab at the top of this page. If you'd like to add a video testimonial, please email it to me at Jason@ThePreventiveVet.com or post it on your Facebook page. Thank you - sincerely :-)

 

 

The Problem

Every day, cats and dogs around the world suffer and die from injuries, illnesses, poisonings, and other emergencies. While not all are preventable,many are. In such cases, prior awareness and taking simple steps can help you keep your pets pain-free, healthy, and out of the ER.

But how do you become aware? How do you learn those simple steps?

After all, raising cats and dogs well and safely isn't always intuitive - they're different than us. Most cats and dogs, if given the chance, will get into all sorts of trouble. And they're susceptible to injuries, illnesses, and poisonings that many pet owners -- regardless of experience level -- would never even think of (and frequently only learn about once it's too late).

Here, try this short pet safety "quiz" to get a quick sense of how well-protected your pets are...

  • What common ingredient of sugar-free gums, that's completely safe for people, can drop your dog's blood sugar to dangerously low levels and destroy their liver even with a small amount of exposure?
  • List 3 factors specific to your dog that can increase their risk for developing Heat Stroke (a devastating and quickly fatal emergency condition).
  • List 3 factors that increase your cat's risk for developing a urethral obstruction (a common, devastating, and quickly fatal emergency condition).
  • Name a type of ornate flower commonly found in bouquets and growing in gardens that can destroy your cat's kidneys, landing them in the ICU or worse, with even minimal exposure.
  • How can you quickly and reliably find a pet emergency hospital when traveling with your pets away from home?

This is but a very small sample of the information that you need to know to protect your pets and to avoid a stressful, costly, time-consuming, and potentially heart-breaking emergency trip to the vet.

Even if you "aced" this little quiz, please keep in mind that a great majority of pet owners don't - and their lack of awareness is contributing to preventable pain and suffering for a great many pets. I know this to be true - both because of the feedback I've gotten on my website and because of the number of preventable emergencies my colleagues and I see on a daily basis in the veterinary hospitals and emergency rooms all around the world.

"One of the saddest parts of emergency veterinary medicine is seeing pets that have suffered illnesses or injuries that were potentially preventable. Dr. Nicholas has demonstrated a tremendous amount of passion and initiative by providing client education and public awareness in an effort to decrease the number of tragic cases seen at veterinary emergency clinics nationwide." - Dr. Erika Loftin, DVM, Dipl. American College of Veterinary Emergency & Critical Care

The whole goal of ThePreventiveVet.com is to empower pet owners everywhere with the information, resources, and advice they need to keep their pets safe and well. Now I want to take that same online mission and expand it to the printed world! These books are chock full of vital information and easy-to-read, easy-to-implement tips for pet owners.. but I need your financial & word-of-mouth help to publish them.

 

The Solution

"Starting Off On The Right Paw" is the working title for the pet safety awareness and tips books I've written -- one book for cat owners, and one for dog owners. 

Don't let the title fool you though, these books aren't just for those newly or recently undertaking pet ownership. The information, resources, and advice they contain will prove eye-opening and invaluable - even for experienced pet owners. These books will also be valuable to those who help busy pet owners care for their cats and dogs (pet sitters, dog walkers, groomers, veterinarians, etc.).

Like my website and other outreach, these books will help you improve and protect the health and safety of your pets! This isn't just my mission, it's my promise, too.

What's covered in these books:

  • Awareness about the wide variety of foods and other substances around your home that can be devastating to your pet's health and wellbeing
  • Information and advice about the factors that affect your pet's risk of developing certain diseases or suffering certain emergency conditions
  • Information you need to be aware of when you travel with your pets
  • The simple steps you can take to prevent the vast majority of pet poisonings
  • Information and advice to prevent digestive upset in pets
  • Awareness and prevention tips for common holiday pet emergencies
  • Simple steps you can take around your house that can prevent urinary problems in cats 
  • And a whole lot more

These books are packed with information, tips, stories, resources, and illustrations that will increase awareness, preparedness, and prevention of many of the most common, costly, and debilitating illnesses and emergencies affecting cats and dogs today. And they will do so in an easy-to-follow and interesting-to-read "quick tip" style.

 

 

 


The images above are some of Chuck Gonzales' past work - they are being shown here to demonstrate the general style in which he will illustrate these two books.

 

Again, these books are already written! I just need your help to raise the funds (and awareness) to get them off my computer, into production, and into the hands and homes of those who love and care for pets.

Where the money is going:

  • Obtaining ISBNs ($500)
  • Editing for two books ($1,300)
  • Layout & design for two books ($2,000)
  • Cover & interior illustrations for two books (varies by number and complexity of illustrations, between $8,000-10,000)
  • Printing costs for two books (varies by quantity, roughly $3,000-5,000)
  • Production & shipping costs for rewards (dependent on types and quantities chosen, but well worth it :-)

 

The Rewards

In exchange for your backing of this project, I have created some great rewards. From great deals on the books themselves to the opportunity to have your pet illustrated to be the cover model for one of the books, there's lots to be had.

You can see the different rewards and packages I've put together on the right side of your screen. Backers at EVERY level will receive my deepest gratitude and that warm, fuzzy feeling of knowing that you are helping to protect and keep safe cats and dogs everywhere. You'll also be mentioned in an upcoming "thank you" blog post for all my supporters, but I'd also love to thank you personally and in "real time". So please tweet to me (@PreventiveVet) and/or post on my Facebook page to let me know you contributed.

*If there's another bulk book quantity you'd like to order (for your rescue, shelter, practice, bookstore, etc) please just contact me (Jason@ThePreventiveVet.com) and I'll make it possible. Similarly, if there's another reward you'd like to see offered, just shoot me an email with your idea.

 

 

Below are images of some of the rewards and the answers to the quiz questions posed above. You can also see video testimonials from friends and fans of The Preventive Vet by clicking on the "Gallery" tab at the top of this page (above the project video).

Thank you so much again for your help in making these important books a reality! I'm excited to get them out there and into the hands of pet lovers everywhere so they can start making the difference I know they will. Stay tuned for updates, you're part of this pet safety movement now :-)

 

Reward Images:

The checklists shown above are actual checklists from the whole home pet-proofing guide. These particular pages are from the Kitchen portion of the guide. The guide also includes checklists for pet-proofing your bathrooms, bedrooms, laundry room, garage, yard, and every other room and area of your house, too. For more information about this guide and how it can help you click here.

The image above is the front and back side of the awesome QR code pet ID tags that I've developed in conjunction with the great folks at PetHub. This is the newest and best way to identify your pet and maximize their chances of being returned safely home to you should they ever go missing. The tag and unique QR code gets your pet their very own webpage on the PetHub site, making it easy for ANYONE who finds them to contact you by whichever means you would like for them to. For more information on PetHub's QR code technology, click here.

 

 

Special thanks go to:

  • Nathan Isaacs of Seven G Media for video assistance and production
  • Alicia Dickerson of Four-Legged Photo for the use of the photo seen in the project image
  • Michael J. Deas for the use of the Ben Franklin portrait
  • Dr. Courtney Anders and staff at Pearl Animal Hospital for location shooting and book review
  • Casey Newton and staff at Wonder Puppy for location shooting
  • Drs. Kristin Sulis and Krissy Bussmann (Mt. Tabor Vet Care) & Dr. Valli Parthasarathy (Synergy Behavior Solutions) for book review
  • All of the wonderful pet owners who have followed along at ThePreventiveVet.com and on the social media pages - it's for you and your pets that this is all happening. Thanks so much for taking pet safety to heart and for letting me help you.

 

Answers to "quiz" questions:

  • Xylitol - a sugar alcohol. It's not just present in many sugar-free gums. It is also commonly found in toothpastes and mouthwashes, mints, baked goods for diabetics, and even in some brands of children's chewable vitamins. For more information on this deadly, but not well known about dog toxin, please see my blog post here.
  • The list of factors that influence your dog's risk for heat stroke includes their breed (brachycephalic or "snub-nosed" breeds and their mixes are at increased risk), their age (puppies and senior dogs are at greater risk),pre-existing medical conditions (laryngeal paralysis, collapsing trachea, brachycephalic obstructive airway syndrome, heart disease, arthritis, obesity, and other chronic conditions increase their risks), a previous history of heat-related illness, and the environmental temperature and humidity. Many other factors can influence your dog's risk, too. For more information on the condition and what you need to know to prevent it, see my blog post here.
  • The factors that increase your cat's risk of developing urethral obstruction include eating dry food, too few litter boxes for the number of cats in the house, obesity, a stressful event in the home or family, andinfrequent litter box scooping/cleaning. This is just a partial list though, for more information on this devastating and preventable condition, see my 3-part series of blog posts here.
  • Lilies - The "true lilies" are highly toxic to cat kidneys, leading to acute kidney failure which is often fatal if not detected and treated early and aggressively. The "true lily" group includes Easter lilies, Stargazer lilies,Tiger lilies, Japanese show lilies, and Rubrum lilies. Some varieties ofday lilies can be similarly toxic, too. And it's not just the petals that are toxic - the stems, pollen, and even vase water can be deadly. For more information on the dangers of lilies in cats, please see my blog post here.
  • Until they put up blue "H" signs for pet hospitals along the Interstates, the best way to find a pet ER while on vacation is to check the website for either the Veterinary Emergency and Critical Care Society or theMyVeterinarian.com website maintained by the American Veterinary medical Association. Both are hyperlinked here, and both are also available on the Resources page of my website.

These books will also be valuable to those who help busy pet owners care for their cats and dogs (pet sitters, dog walkers, groomers, veterinarians, etc.).
Like my website and other outreach, these books will help you improve and protect the health and safety of your pets! This isn't just my mission, it's my promise, too.
What's covered in these books:

Awareness about the wide variety of foods and other substances around your home that can be devastating to your pet's health and wellbeing
Information and advice about the factors that affect your pet's risk of developing certain diseases or suffering certain emergency conditions
Information you need to be aware of when you travel with your pets
The simple steps you can take to prevent the vast majority of pet poisonings
Information and advice to prevent digestive upset in pets
Awareness and prevention tips for common holiday pet emergencies
Simple steps you can take around your house that can prevent urinary problems in cats 
And a whole lot more
These books are packed with information, tips, stories, resources, and illustrations that will increase awareness, preparedness, and prevention of many of the most common, costly, and debilitating illnesses and emergencies affecting cats and dogs today. And they will do so in an easy-to-follow and interesting-to-read "quick tip" style.

 
 

 
The images above are some of Chuck Gonzales' past work - they are being shown here to demonstrate the general style in which he will illustrate these two books.
 
Again, these books are already written! I just need your help to raise the funds (and awareness) to get them off my computer, into production, and into the hands and homes of those who love and care for pets.
Where the money is going:

Obtaining ISBNs ($500)
Editing for two books ($1,300)
Layout & design for two books ($2,000)
Cover & interior illustrations for two books (varies by number and complexity of illustrations, between $8,000-10,000)
Printing costs for two books (varies by quantity, roughly $3,000-5,000)
Production & shipping costs for rewards (dependent on types and quantities chosen, but well worth it :-)
 
The Rewards
In exchange for your backing of this project, I have created some great rewards. From great deals on the books themselves to the opportunity to have your pet illustrated to be the cover model for one of the books, there's lots to be had.
You can see the different rewards and packages I've put together on the right side of your screen. Backers at EVERY level will receive my deepest gratitude and that warm, fuzzy feeling of knowing that you are helping to protect and keep safe cats and dogs everywhere. You'll also be mentioned in an upcoming "thank you" blog post for all my supporters, but I'd also love to thank you personally and in "real time". So please tweet to me (@PreventiveVet) and/or post on my Facebook page to let me know you contributed.
*If there's another bulk book quantity you'd like to order (for your rescue, shelter, practice, bookstore, etc) please just contact me (Jason@ThePreventiveVet.com) and I'll make it possible. Similarly, if there's another reward you'd like to see offered, just shoot me an email with your idea.
 

 
Below are images of some of the rewards and the answers to the quiz questions posed above. You can also see video testimonials from friends and fans of The Preventive Vet by clicking on the "Gallery" tab at the top of this page (above the project video).
Thank you so much again for your help in making these important books a reality! I'm excited to get them out there and into the hands of pet lovers everywhere so they can start making the difference I know they will. Stay tuned for updates, you're part of this pet safety movement now :-)
 
Reward Images:

The checklists shown above are actual checklists from the whole home pet-proofing guide. These particular pages are from the Kitchen portion of the guide. The guide also includes checklists for pet-proofing your bathrooms, bedrooms, laundry room, garage, yard, and every other room and area of your house, too. For more information about this guide and how it can help you click here.

The image above is the front and back side of the awesome QR code pet ID tags that I've developed in conjunction with the great folks at PetHub. This is the newest and best way to identify your pet and maximize their chances of being returned safely home to you should they ever go missing. The tag and unique QR code gets your pet their very own webpage on the PetHub site, making it easy for ANYONE who finds them to contact you by whichever means you would like for them to. For more information on PetHub's QR code technology, click here.
 

 
Special thanks go to:

Nathan Isaacs of Seven G Media for video assistance and production
Alicia Dickerson of Four-Legged Photo for the use of the photo seen in the project image

Michael J. Deas for the use of the Ben Franklin portrait
Dr. Courtney Anders and staff at Pearl Animal Hospital for location shooting and book review
Casey Newton and staff at Wonder Puppy for location shooting
Drs. Kristin Sulis and Krissy Bussmann (Mt. Tabor Vet Care) & Dr. Valli Parthasarathy (Synergy Behavior Solutions) for book review
All of the wonderful pet owners who have followed along at ThePreventiveVet.com and on the social media pages - it's for you and your pets that this is all happening. Thanks so much for taking pet safety to heart and for letting me help you.
 
Answers to "quiz" questions:



Xylitol - a sugar alcohol. It's not just present in many sugar-free gums. It is also commonly found in toothpastes and mouthwashes, mints, baked goods for diabetics, and even in some brands of children's chewable vitamins. For more information on this deadly, but not well known about dog toxin, please see my blog post here.
The list of factors that influence your dog's risk for heat stroke includes their breed (brachycephalic or "snub-nosed" breeds and their mixes are at increased risk), their age (puppies and senior dogs are at greater risk),pre-existing medical conditions (laryngeal paralysis, collapsing trachea, brachycephalic obstructive airway syndrome, heart disease, arthritis, obesity, and other chronic conditions increase their risks), a previous history of heat-related illness, and the environmental temperature and humidity. Many other factors can influence your dog's risk, too. For more information on the condition and what you need to know to prevent it, see my blog post here.
The factors that increase your cat's risk of developing urethral obstruction include eating dry food, too few litter boxes for the number of cats in the house, obesity, a stressful event in the home or family, andinfrequent litter box scooping/cleaning. This is just a partial list though, for more information on this devastating and preventable condition, see my 3-part series of blog posts here.

Lilies - The "true lilies" are highly toxic to cat kidneys, leading to acute kidney failure which is often fatal if not detected and treated early and aggressively. The "true lily" group includes Easter lilies, Stargazer lilies,Tiger lilies, Japanese show lilies, and Rubrum lilies. Some varieties ofday lilies can be similarly toxic, too. And it's not just the petals that are toxic - the stems, pollen, and even vase water can be deadly. For more information on the dangers of lilies in cats, please see my blog post here.
Until they put up blue "H" signs for pet hospitals along the Interstates, the best way to find a pet ER while on vacation is to check the website for either the Veterinary Emergency and Critical Care Society or theMyVeterinarian.com website maintained by the American Veterinary medical Association. Both are hyperlinked here, and both are also available on the Resources page of my website.

story:
Time to know your neighbors!

Nowadays, we see massive propaganda and myths about life in different countries, cities. It may be real, if your parents and government say that you are living in the best country on Earth and it's better to stay here. But is it really truth? Do you think you live in the best country? Or do you think the place you are to move is good for you? Do you know the real life there?

The project “Around the World” with professionals bloggers, writers, travelers and volunteers all over the world are going to make an encyclopedia about real life on the planet by inhabitants eyes.

We are going to ask people about their opinions of living in their places. In one year we are going to contact with inhabitants of every country on the Earth, study their opinions and write the conclusion in our book. You will be able to find basic informations about countries, statistic of our study and opinions about life in every country on Earth.

In the encyclopedia you will be able to find:

  • Basic information about the country (capital, big cities, popular places, statistic of the country)

  • Economic situation of the country (popular professions, hard professions, average salaries of popular professions, forecast on nearest future, suggestions for people who want to the country for work or start own deal there)

  • Culture and traditions

  • Opinions about life in the country of inhabitants

  • Opinions about life in the country from people who moved in.

Forecast of the work on the book

  1. Contact more than 3 000 000 people.

  2. Cooperate with more than 3 000 writers and bloggers

  3. Cooperate with more than 10 000 travelers

  4. Book will be translated on Russian, English, Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish, Italian.
  5. We expect more than 700 000 publications all over the world.

Charity donation!

After the book will be published, we want to share our profit with orphanages of Turkey, Ukraine, Russia and EC.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Say to your friends about us! 
    • Write short story about life in your city, country!
    • Don't forget about Indiegogo share tools!
    • Subscribe to our site and be in touch with all the news and read stories about life in different countries!

story:
Imagine no religion...

We've all heard John Lennon's sentiment. It'll never happen. Our world will always have diverse beliefs, and sadly, they often sanctify our division and hatred.

But what if our deepest convictions could lead us to unity? What if they contributed to our spiritual evolution rather than hinder it? For this to happen, we need the kind of "Overview" astronauts receive when they view our planet. The beauty and fragility of Earth speaks of the urgent need to cherish and preserve it for future generations. What we have in common is far more important than what divides us!

If you've ever prayed or longed for more unity on earth, we ask you to support this book project: "Invitation to The Overview" by Krin Van Tatenhove. Springing from one man's journey through stages of faith, we hope it helps others find their way. In addition to the book, your contribution will give you a download of - "The Way is Simple" - by singer/songwriter Hanna Leigh.

All proceeds benefit the nonprofit, Torch of Faith, www.torchoffaith.com

After you've read the booklet, join the Facebook dialogue at https://www.facebook.com/invitationtotheoverview

story:
Short Summary

Spy stories are fun, but real spy stories are even cooler, and that is why I am so excited to tell you about a project I am working on. 

I just recently inked a book deal with a London publisher to tell the real-life spy story of Curt Prüfer, a German spymaster, propagandist and intelligence analyst in the World War One-era Middle East. I will be translating the man's diaries and his official reports to the German Foreign Office from German into English and writing the accompanying explanatory text. My contract is signed, sent and delivered now, and I'm well into finishing the bulk of the translation of the diaries and reports.   

A few very important tasks remain:

  • I will need to travel abroad (and within the US) to find further records of this man's nefarious wartime activities.
  • I will need to hire translators to help decipher some unreadable diary passages from German and translate some Turkish documents. 

I'm not getting any advance from my publisher, and I couldn't find any research grants that are geared towards independent historians like me. I've already spent much of my own money on making this book a reality, but I simply don't have the funds to take this project all the way to completion, and this is why  I've decided to take the crowd funding approach to financing my work. And this is where you come in. 

Because you are the people who are going to help me make this happen. 


I have no financial support from publisher or academic institution to bring to the table, and I don't have the funds to finish the job. This means that you are my support. You and your networks of fellow spy-story fans, historians and history buffs that love intelligent real stories about intelligence operations in the age of empire, the making of the modern Middle East and World War I.   You, my team, my co-laborers in this work, are the ones I am depending on to both fund the completion of this project, and and to spread the word to other potentially interested supporters. 


So now, let me give you a brief summary of Curt Prüfer's story, just so you can see what I'm asking you to support. 

The Germans lusted for a sphere of influence in the Ottoman-dominated Middle Eastern long before the outbreak of war in 1914. Years in advance, they hatched a plan that called for fomenting revolutions among disgruntled Muslim populations under the imperial domination of Germany’s enemies. The diversion of enemy troops from the main fighting front needed to put down these uprisings, they believed, would fatally dissipate enemy strength and give Germany the advantage needed for victory. When war did finally erupt in the summer of 1914, the Foreign Office immediately summoned a cadre of shadow warriors to the Middle East to put the subversion campaign plan into action. Among them was Curt Prüfer. 

The plan failed in the end, and Germany and its Turkish allies lost the war.  Bitter disillusionment and an unwillingness to face Germany's responsibility for its loss consumed Prüfer in the years that followed, and ultimately, he would channel his rage into a descending spiral of anti-semitism and finally, Naziism. 

Prüfer's record of his innermost thoughts and doings in this period are important for a couple of reasons: 1). his writings open to the reader a perspective perfectly representing the mindset typical of late European imperialism on the eve of its collapse; 2). his documenting of interactions with the region's future movers and shakers also gives a foretaste of the modern Middle East that was even then struggling to be born. 

I first discovered this this guy while doing historical research for the book Lawrence in Arabia by Scott Anderson over the course of three years. The many other books I read about the activity of the Germans in the Middle East in this period used these materials in brief quotations, but none had tried to translate the entirety of the literary remains of this man's life for this time period. I had already translated large portions of it anyway, so I figured I'd plow ahead. 

What We Need & What You Get

This effort is going to take about $5,600. Funds raised will be used for the following things (in approximate amounts):

  • Air fare to and from Europe and the Middle East (Berlin, Cologne, Istanbul, Jerusalem): $1950.
  • Lodging (about $35/night for 30 days): $1000
  • Payment to Ottoman Turkish translator: $750
  • Payment to German translator for correcting translation: $1500
  • Miscellaneous administrative costs: $500

I plan to make my trip abroad either in late August or early September, and the first version of the manuscript is due to my publisher by New Year's Eve this year. The expected date of publication will be sometime in the fall of 2015. 

Just one other note I need to stress: I am self-employed, so when I take off into the blue to do my research this summer (and I will probably be gone an entire month!), I will not be drawing down any income, which makes this fund-raising effort all the more important. 

In return for your generous support, I'd like to invite you into the process of recreating this vanished world of spies, saboteurs, soldiers and politicians through my research and translation work. In addition, I'd like to reward all of you who contribute with a number of exciting perks that will include shout-outs to you by name in the acknowledgement section of my book, signed copies of the book, cool ephemera (picture post cards and envelopes, coins, etc.) from the World War I-era Middle East, meetings with me, the author, etc.  

If our funding campaign doesn't fully reach its goal, I will still receive what we did raise for a slightly higher fee to Indiegogo. 

The Impact

I fell in love with the Middle East the moment I set first set foot in the region when I went to work for an international non-profit organization in Jerusalem in 2004. The incredible friendliness and hospitality of its people drew me in immediately, but once I was able to walk its streets in person and to see with my own eyes the stone remnants of thousands of years of its history and culture, once I recognize the echoes of the ancient civilizations--Egypt, Sumeria, Babylon the great--which I had only read about in books as a kid, I loved it even more. 

Obviously, I am not the only one to catch a hankering for this beautiful, ancient part of the world. This crossroads between Europe, Asia and Africa has attracted the covetous desire of many nations over the centuries, and the struggle for its strategically-placed lands and its resources has made this region of the world...well, complicated, very complicated indeed. 

And this complexity is what makes the Middle East so interesting, particularly as its messy and complicated past still affects us westerners in many different ways today. It is especially interesting to note how much the happenings of today repeats the recent historical past in ways that are very instructive for the present. Without doubt, in this story that you are helping me tell about Germany sought to cynically harness the forces of religious fanaticism in the Ottoman Empire to achieve its selfish, geopolitical purposes, we see echoes of the Soviet war in Afghanistan and even the current civil war in Syria. 

While we westerners have officially come home from our wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, leaving the situations in those tormented nations to simmer at a low boil (with occasional escalations to a moderate boil), we will long remain joined at the hip with the troubles of that region, if only indirectly. It's in our best interest to continue learning about what makes the Middle East tick, then, if we want to respond to events there by making smart, informed choices. 

The writing of this book which you're supporting is a part of that effort at growth in understanding, and really is part of a larger mission to learn and then teach fellow westerners about this region, another brick in the wall that brings peace through understanding. You can be proud that your contributions and other efforts to support this venture are helping to build that better future...little by little. 

Other Ways You Can Help

And speaking of other ways to help beside contributing, there are other things you can do to support this project besides contributing cash, as wonderful as that is. If you aren't in a place where you can support me financially but still want to do something, help me get the word out! Make some noise in your own network about this funding campaign through Twitter or Facebook or the social media platform of your choice. 

And above all, have fun with this!

story:
Summary

We are a new, independent, progressive publisher of Science Fiction and Fantasy eBooks with a difference: we will work with authors to make their writing as good as it can be. We will offer a full range of editorial services, cover design, and marketing and promotion—and unlike many so-called publishers, we will not charge for these services. We are of the firm belief that people should be paid for the work that they do. If a manuscript is accepted after it goes through our review process, we will give the author an advance on royalties, provide an editorial staff to work with the author to make the manuscript as good as it can be, and then promote the book on all of the major online stores, at trade shows, and at conventions. And the royalty stream we will offer is as good as anything you'll find out there—guaranteed.

What We're Looking For

We'll use the funds raised here to bring a minimum of six books to market in the first year. Here are our goals:

  • We're looking to raise $75,000 to fund software development to streamline the editorial process (around 1/3 of the total), to pay advance royalties to authors whose manuscripts we accept (another 1/3), and to help take care of the first year of operations (the rest). 
  • We will use these funds to pay editors, designers, artists, programmers, and for marketing and promotion of the titles we accept.
  • We are offering a range of perks, from free copies of our first titles, to Kindles, to advance reader copies of every book we publish—for life!
  • We're moving forward whether we hit our target or not, but the more we raise, the faster we'll be able to bring books out. A contribution of any amount is greatly appreciated, and will help us move forward.

Why We're Doing This

At DEP, we are committed to offering new and published writers a publishing model and apparatus that rejects the star system currently in vogue with massive publishing houses. Too many great books are silenced by the hyper-commercialized, deeply corporatized gatekeeping arrangement that is currently the norm. We don't think the current editor-agent arrangement is a sustainable publishing model, and we don't think it nourishes great creative output either. We at DEP want to give the industry back to the most important people in it: you, the writers. And we believe that the sophistication of our business model, based on combining the democratizing elements of digital technology and the editorial peer review process, promises to make it possible for more writers to reach more readers without all the red tape, bureaucracy, and frustration of current industry practices.

  • We want to make it possible for talented writers to get noticed, and to get their work in front of the reading public.
  • We are not a self-publishing company. We'll never ask writers for money, and we will only accept high quality, well written stories.
  • We believe that writers should be paid for their work, and will offer an advance on royalties for a high quality manuscript.
  • Writers will be involved in the editorial and publishing process at every step.

Who We Are

This project comes from Trevor Sawler, who has been reading fantasy, science fiction and all kinds of speculative fiction for as long as he can remember. During the day, he spends a fair bit of time in the classroom as an English professor at a small liberal arts University in Eastern Canada. In addition to a career in academia, he has had a parallel career in information technology. He has had three successful IT companies over the past twenty years, and has developed software and web applications for clients such as Hewlett Packard, Thomson Nelson, Keybank, Sprint, General Motors, and a wide variety of customers across North America, western Europe, and the Carribean. His work in both  academic and  technological fields has earned him regional, national, and international awards. In addition, he has nearly two decades of hands-on editorial experience, and has acted as both editor and managing editor for literary magazines, several books, and as external reviewer for internationally recognized publications.

Trevor is working with a team of other writers and editors, all with at least a Masters degree, and most with a PhD (but don't hold that against them—they love Fantasy and Science Fiction as much as anyone out there).

Visit our site at http://www.dogearedpress.ca to learn more about what we're up to, and if you have a manuscript that you think is worth looking at, we're ready to receive it at any time.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support our Indiegogo campaign, that doesn't mean you can't help. You can let others know about us, and point gifted authors our way:

  • Post a link to this page to your friends on social media
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools on this page;
  • Let your friends who are aspiring or established wordsmiths know about us, and encourage them to submit a manuscript.

This will be an exciting ride, and we hope you're interested in coming along.
story_txt:
SummaryWe are a new, independent, progressive publisher of Science Fiction and Fantasy eBooks with a difference: we will work with authors to make their writing as good as it can be. We will offer a full range of editorial services, cover design, and marketing and promotion—and unlike many so-called publishers, we will not charge for these services. We are of the firm belief that people should be paid for the work that they do. If a manuscript is accepted after it goes through our review process, we will give the author an advance on royalties, provide an editorial staff to work with the author to make the manuscript as good as it can be, and then promote the book on all of the major online stores, at trade shows, and at conventions. And the royalty stream we will offer is as good as anything you'll find out there—guaranteed.What We're Looking ForWe'll use the funds raised here to bring a minimum of six books to market in the first year. Here are our goals:
We're looking to raise $75,000 to fund software development to streamline the editorial process (around 1/3 of the total), to pay advance royalties to authors whose manuscripts we accept (another 1/3), and to help take care of the first year of operations (the rest). 
We will use these funds to pay editors, designers, artists, programmers, and for marketing and promotion of the titles we accept.
We are offering a range of perks, from free copies of our first titles, to Kindles, to advance reader copies of every book we publish—for life!
We're moving forward whether we hit our target or not, but the more we raise, the faster we'll be able to bring books out. A contribution of any amount is greatly appreciated, and will help us move forward.
Why We're Doing ThisAt DEP, we are committed to offering new and published writers a publishing model and apparatus that rejects the star system currently in vogue with massive publishing houses. Too many great books are silenced by the hyper-commercialized, deeply corporatized gatekeeping arrangement that is currently the norm. We don't think the current editor-agent arrangement is a sustainable publishing model, and we don't think it nourishes great creative output either. We at DEP want to give the industry back to the most important people in it: you, the writers. And we believe that the sophistication of our business model, based on combining the democratizing elements of digital technology and the editorial peer review process, promises to make it possible for more writers to reach more readers without all the red tape, bureaucracy, and frustration of current industry practices.
We want to make it possible for talented writers to get noticed, and to get their work in front of the reading public.

We are not a self-publishing company. We'll never ask writers for money, and we will only accept high quality, well written stories.
We believe that writers should be paid for their work, and will offer an advance on royalties for a high quality manuscript.
Writers will be involved in the editorial and publishing process at every step.

This will be an exciting ride, and we hope you're interested in coming along.

story:
Bref résumé

Quelque 400 ans après l’arrivée de l’explorateur Samuel de Champlain en Ontario, 24 écrivains - 10 Franco-Ontariens, 6 Français, 4 Québécois, 2 Acadiens et 2 Amérindiens - vont refaire le parcours de cet aventurier de la première heure.

Le concept des 24 heures du roman est simple :

Au départ de Halifax, Nouvelle-Écosse, le 23 octobre 2015, les 24 écrivains montent dans le train l’Océan. 

Leur mission : écrire un roman en 24 heures dont Champlain sera le personnage central.

Quelque 24 heures et 24 chapitres plus tard, les rescapés de cette aventure ferroviaire et littéraire hors du commun seront accueillis en fanfare à leur descente du train à Toronto en Ontario et présenteront fièrement le roman terminé au public. Il sera ensuite publié par les Éditions Prise de parole et disponible en librairie à compter du 16 novembre 2015 sous le titre Sur les traces de Champlain : un destin extraordinaire en 24 tableaux.

Les 24 heures du roman est une expérience à la croisée de plusieurs cultures. De cette rencontre unique naîtra un livre de fiction inhabituel, une mosaïque d’histoires qui s’entremêlent au fil des pages, dans une langue aux tonalités multiples et à l’écriture d’une richesse vingtquatruplée.

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

  • Embarquez avec nous dans cette aventure extraordinaire et parcourez les derniers kilomètres à nos côtés afin d’assurer le succès de ce voyage sans précédent sur les traces de Champlain. Vous pouvez faire toute la différence, car il nous reste encore 12 000 $ à recueillir. 
  • Nous vous invitons à devenir 

    « Ami-e des 24 heures » 

    en nous donnant un dernier coup de pouce. En guise de remerciement nous vous offrirons, selon le montant que vous aurez choisi, soit un jeu de cartes : Canada 1615, un exemplaire du livre Sur les traces de Champlain : un destin extraordinaire en 24 tableaux, soit un Abécédaire de l’Oulipo publié chez Larousse, soit une invitation à la soirée privée à Toronto en présence des 24 auteurs, soit une combinaison de toutes ces belles choses ou même un billet de train pour participer à cette aventure historique !
  • Vous recevrez un reçu pour don de charité pour tout DON en argent d’une valeur de 20 $ ou plus !

D'autres façons d’aider 

  • N’hésitez pas à parler de nous à votre entourage et dans les médias sociaux. Vous êtes indispensables à la réussite de cet événement !
  • Faites-nous parvenir vos commentaires sur notre site ; suivez-nous pas à pas sur Facebook et Twitter.
  • Dons directement sur le site.
  • Nous sommes un organisme à but non lucratif, vous pouvez également joindre notre équipe de bénévoles si le cœur vous en dit, merci. Il suffit de prendre contact avec nous.
  • Venez tous nous retrouver le 24 octobre 2015 à la gare Union de Toronto pour une grande fête !

Les auteurs

D'autres façons d’aider 
N’hésitez pas à parler de nous à votre entourage et dans les médias sociaux. Vous êtes indispensables à la réussite de cet événement !
Faites-nous parvenir vos commentaires sur notre site ; suivez-nous pas à pas sur Facebook et Twitter.
Dons directement sur le site.
Nous sommes un organisme à but non lucratif, vous pouvez également joindre notre équipe de bénévoles si le cœur vous en dit, merci. Il suffit de prendre contact avec nous.
Venez tous nous retrouver le 24 octobre 2015 à la gare Union de Toronto pour une grande fête !

story:
Comox Valley Peace Group

    We are a group of concerned citizens who believe that Bill C-24 reduces the rights of many Canadian citizens: those who were born elsewhere and even some born in Canada Canadians.  Help join us in re-establishing our rights of citizenship.  Make a donation to help overturn Bill C-24. 

    Already we are seeing citizenship being pulled from born in Canada Canadians, who have no other citizenship.  The term terrorism is being more loosely used -- and those who criticise the tar sands development or our democratic rights will be the "terrorists" (as defined) of tomorrow.  

      Don't let Bill C-24 take away your citizenship rights.  If you are not able to make a donation, raise your concerns about Bill C-24 with your family and friends, in your community, and at all-candidate meetings.

story:
"If a poem would be worth a plane ticket, what would that mean to those that have never been able to leave their block, their city or their country?" 


Short Summary

My name is Kevin. I represent a small but diverse group of international poets and event producers from the USA, Brazil, India, Great Britain, South Africa and the Netherlands. We all share one dream; To create the world's first social platform for and by poets, on and offline. We call it SPOKEN. This is the story; 

It all began between the summer of 2006 and the fall of 2010, when I wrote and released three independent albums under the artist name BLAXTAR. During this time I received several Dutch Hiphop awards in Amsterdam. 

With the aim of bringing my message to a wider audience I began performing my lyrics with no music, no entourage, only words. Now, all of a sudden, I was considered a poet rather than a rapper. This was well-received.  I invited my Hiphop colleagues, and we all loved to perform this way. The launch was amazing! 

Light-bulb moment! 

We created an event, SPOKEN: In The Presence Of Poets, in which the goal was to get people to really listen to lyrics. We added two more interactive elements through which the audience could get to know the person behind the artist.

Read the Google translation of the article about the first SPOKEN in Amsterdam

Inspired by the success of the pilot event we invited 'real' poets, comedians, authors and other expressive minds to come and perform alongside us Hiphop artists. There is a long list of non-Hiphop artists who have performed at SPOKEN with us, and loved it. 

Once we realized the potential of the concept we wanted to take the concept to other countries. It dawned on us that artistic and cultural experiences enrich people's lives. Great art and culture inspires people, brings people together and teaches us about ourselves and the world around us. In short, artistic and cultural experiences make life better.

Everywhere we came we met people with incredible talent for writing and performing. In addition to co-creating SPOKEN events with them we were also able to provide some artists the opportunity to travel and perform at SPOKEN events on the other side of the planet. 

 After 5 years we can safely say that SPOKEN has become an international platform. Without any structural financial backing we were able to connect SPOKEN to the poetry scene in São Paulo, New York, Paramaribo and Amsterdam. Poets in New Delhi, Johannesburg, London, Birmingham and Hong Kong have expressed eagerness to be a part of the current SPOKEN network. 


The Scope Of SPOKENfm


 We have used our Facebook page to invite people to send us their video performances. In this way we could curate the SPOKEN event in their own city or abroad. In one instance we chose two Dutch poets to come and perform at SPOKEN in São Paulo for example. 


What if SPOKENfm had it's own website, where artists can create their profile with lyric or poem videos, and through that profile get booked for SPOKEN events somewhere in the world! Wouldn't that be a revolution in and of itself? What if we could create the world's first social platform for international modern poetry entertainment, with artists who meet each other at SPOKEN events, co-create online, exchange thoughts and spread their ideas about social and economic topics in creative ways? 

The SPOKENfm website will enable poets and other writers/performers to:

  • create a profile with their work (video, audio, text)
  • earn credit by reviewing other artist's work 
  • connect to artists they like anywhere 
  • digitally co-create 
  • be booked by theaters for SPOKEN events (or affiliated programs)
  • activate several other tools that make it easier to be booked internationally

If a poem would be worth a plane ticket, what would that do with those that have never been able to leave their block, their city or their country? 

Obviously, the try outs we did were small scale events. But can you imagine the potential? If we could bring all our networks together on one single state of the art website this would be a unique platform. You could help us establish the world's first and only international network of poetry minded people! A Myspace for poets with offline events on every continent! 


What We Need

We have used and exhausted all our resources to build the network that SPOKEN is today. We feel SPOKEN is, at this point, a great idea. But with your help, we could transform this idea into the foundation for a revolutionary network! There is currently no platform for international modern interactive poetry, and we think SPOKEN ought to be the first one. We can only hope you agree! 

In five years only two of the 30+ SPOKEN events were partially subsidised. The rest of the events were personally financed by ourselves because we believe that SPOKEN is so much bigger than any one poet's career. We produced SPOKEN events with the help of a long list of wonderful people who dedicated their time and energy to making these events happen. But now we need to create a state of the art website to help push SPOKEN to the next level. 

Will you help us reach more artists in more cities worldwide with the opportunities that SPOKEN provides and make it possible for modern poets to travel the world and transcend their physical boundaries? Together we can transform the freedom that the internet provides into real opportunities, and place these opportunities in the hands of those that inspire us all. 

We need 10k EUR to build a full website with all the social features, content of past events and start up promotion. We don't expect you to come up with all of that, so we are only using Indiegogo for a part of that amount. For this amount we know we can start building and produce a slimmed down beta version of the website we have planned. 

If we don't reach our goal, we will use the money as a down-payment for the website, and will keep trying to get the total amount necessary to make this happen. Because it's not a matter of 'if' this gets built, it's a matter of 'when'. 


What You Get

First, you will be one of those people that can say they were 'there when it all started'! When SPOKEN is a major network with over a million poets traveling the globe and performing left and right, you get to say:" I helped build that"! But we have more than bragging right to offer you. 

We love to write. So what better way to show our appreciation for your support than for us to write something for you? You tell us who you want to feel special, give us the information about that person, and we'll write something beautiful (or simply something truthful) in your name. For those who donate a little more, we'll put in some more effort, and record your poem and send you the audio. For people that really go all out, we'll follow suit and create a beautiful poetry video for that special person, with music and everything, dedicated to him/her, from you!  We also have a Best Of SPOKEN dvd, with unreleased and inspiring footage of SPOKEN events worldwide!  


The Impact

As mentioned earlier, we are currently receiving requests to bring SPOKEN to beautiful cities like New Delhi, Johannesburg and London. We are, of course, going to push through and try and make that happen, like we did so many times before. But truthfully, we could already use those events to offer opportunities to creative people in your city. So, before we do any more international events, we really would like for the website to be up and running. If you enjoy poetry, good lyrics, theater and inspirational performances, then you love SPOKEN. Believe you me! 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to support our network of artists financially, not to worry. We have all been there. Simply spread the word, we definitely appreciate your network learning about SPOKEN, so that they will come and visit the website once it's done! 

Please use the share buttons to tell people about this. 

Thank you in advance! 

Be safe, 
Kevin de Randamie | BLAXTAR
